translated: The left hand holds a khaṭvāṅga.

original: zhes pa ni g-yon pa'i ngos su'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni g-yon pa'i ngos su'o //
translated: The left side is the khaṭvāṅga.

original: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing //
analyzed: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing //
translated: She is wrapped in a tiger skin,🔽and so on.

original: zhes pa ni stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs so //
translated: This is the tiger-skin skirt.

original: ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar //
analyzed: ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar //
translated: Riding on a corpse, blazing with splendor,

original: phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser //
analyzed: phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser //
translated: with two hands, yellow hair rising upward.

original: zhes pa ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: This is the clarity itself.

original: yang na thams cad ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thams cad ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Or else, everything is Vajradhara.

original: aa bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: aa bdag med ma'o //
translated: A is Nairātmya.

original: gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid kyis thams cad do //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med pa nyid kyis thams cad do //
translated: Everything is the inseparability of the two.

original: de ltar zhes pa yang ae'i cha byad bzang po la //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa yang ae'i cha byad bzang po la //
translated: Thus, in the good figure of A,

original: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: in the middle, adorned with Vaṃ,

original: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
translated: the abode of all bliss,

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: the jewel casket of the Buddha.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of the thought of awakening, the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa gang la yod pa de ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa gang la yod pa de ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The one who has such a form is called the indivisible Vajradhara.

original: bshad ces pa ni kha thugs so //
analyzed: bshad ces pa ni kha thugs so //
translated: The explanation is the mouth.

original: ya rlung gsung ngo //
analyzed: ya rlung gsung ngo //
translated: Ya is the wind, speech.

original: aa gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: aa gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku rdo rje'o //
translated: The form of the letter A is the vajra of body, which is the nature of the aggregate of form.

original: de ltar sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni bya'o //
translated: Thus, the gnosis of the indivisibility of body, speech, and mind is the “to-be-done.”

original: 'di ltar gyur pas na ta'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gyur pas na ta'o //
translated: Since it is like this, it is the “ta.”

original: ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
translated: As the Nairātmyāyoginī

original: de lta bu'i rnam pas ji ltar bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor ma de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pas ji ltar bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor ma de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ces pa'i don to //
translated: is, so are all the dakinis.

original: lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel //
analyzed: lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel //
translated: One hand holds a skull-cup,

original: ka bde ba skyong bar byed pas na thod pa ste /
analyzed: ka bde ba skyong bar byed pas na thod pa ste /
translated: the skull-cup is the source of bliss,

original: chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //
translated: and the source of phenomena is Nairātmya.

original: gcig ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //🔽de ltar na thod pa @94a * //
analyzed: gcig ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o // de ltar na thod pa @94a * //
translated: The other hand holds a vajra.

original: gcig gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid do //
translated: Thus, the skull-cup is the nature of one.

original: lag pa ni gnyi ga lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes 'di ni thod pa gcig gi phyag go //
analyzed: lag pa ni gnyi ga lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes 'di ni thod pa gcig gi phyag go //
translated: The two hands are the nature of the five, and the gnosis of the indivisibility of the three vajras is the “one-skull-cup-hand.”

original: 'dis ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes brel ba dang po dang bral bas brel ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes brel ba dang po dang bral bas brel ba ste /
translated: This is the gnosis of the indivisibility of the two, free from the first coupling, and thus the “coupling.”

original: dang po dang bral ba'i phyir de yang ye shes so //
analyzed: dang po dang bral ba'i phyir de yang ye shes so //
translated: The first is absent, and so it is intuition.

original: aa bdag med ma de dang dbyer med pas lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel lo //
analyzed: aa bdag med ma de dang dbyer med pas lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel lo //
translated: Since he is inseparable from that Nairātmya, he is embraced by the skull.

original: g-yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin //
translated: He holds a flaying knife in his right hand.

original: nyi ma rin chen gtso bo'o //
analyzed: nyi ma rin chen gtso bo'o //
translated: The sun is the chief jewel.

original: rgyu de'i phyir na gri gug 'dzin ni ji ltar gri gug gi sos gcod par byed pa de bzhin du rin chen gtso yang mi shes pa gcod pa yin pas /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir na gri gug 'dzin ni ji ltar gri gug gi sos gcod par byed pa de bzhin du rin chen gtso yang mi shes pa gcod pa yin pas /
translated: For that reason, he holds a flaying knife, just as a flaying knife cuts, so the chief jewel cuts ignorance.

original: lag pa g-yas na gri gug 'dzin no //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas na gri gug 'dzin no //
translated: He holds a flaying knife in his right hand.

original: 'dis ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: This is Vajradhara, inseparable from Nairātmya.

original: g-yon na kha tv'am ga nyid do //
analyzed: g-yon na kha tv'am ga nyid do //
translated: He holds a khaṭvāṅga in his left hand.

original: zhes pa ni g-yon na ni zla ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni g-yon na ni zla ba'o //
translated: The left is the moon.

original: kha tv'am ga ni stong pa nyid bcu drug bdag med ma rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni stong pa nyid bcu drug bdag med ma rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin pa'i don to //
translated: The khaṭvāṅga is the sixteen emptinesses, the pure spirit of enlightenment of Nairātmya.

original: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing //
analyzed: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing //
translated: He is wrapped in a tiger skin.

original: stag gi pags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs su spro ba'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs su spro ba'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: The tiger skin is the sound of the various emanations.

original: dkris pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: dkris pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The embrace is the conventional truth.

original: aa bdag med ma don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: aa bdag med ma don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The goddess is the ultimate truth.

original: gnyi ga dbyer med par 'gro bas na dkris pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med par 'gro bas na dkris pa'o //
translated: The embrace is the going of both as inseparable.

original: 'dis ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gsal bar byas pa yin pa'i don to ;
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gsal bar byas pa yin pa'i don to ;
translated: This is the meaning of the statement that Vajradhara is inseparable from Nairatmya.

original: / ro la zhon pa zhes pa ni ro chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: / ro la zhon pa zhes pa ni ro chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The word “mounted” means mounted on the corpse, which is the ultimate realm.

original: de la zhon pa ni chos kyi dbyings khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhon pa ni chos kyi dbyings khyab pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “mounted” is the pervasion of the ultimate realm.

original: gzi brjid 'bar zhes pa ni rang bzhin med par 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid 'bar zhes pa ni rang bzhin med par 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The word “blazing” means shining with the luster of realitylessness.

original: phyag gnyis zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: phyag gnyis zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The word “two-armed” means having the nature of the two truths.

original: ser skya ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: ser skya ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The word “yellow” means the sun.

original: steng du 'gro ba'i phyir steng ste /
analyzed: steng du 'gro ba'i phyir steng ste /
translated: The word “upward” means above.

original: ser po yang yin la steng yang yin pas gyen du yang ser ro //
analyzed: ser po yang yin la steng yang yin pas gyen du yang ser ro //
translated: It is yellow and above, so it is yellow and upward.

original: mgo skyes ni mgo skyes te zla ba'o //
analyzed: mgo skyes ni mgo skyes te zla ba'o //
translated: The word “crest” means the crest, which is the moon.

original: gyen du ser yang yin la mgo skyes kyang yin pas gyen du dbu skyes ser ro //
analyzed: gyen du ser yang yin la mgo skyes kyang yin pas gyen du dbu skyes ser ro //
translated: It is yellow and upward and a crest, so it is a yellow upward crest.

original: 'di gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yi ge aa ste /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yi ge aa ste /
translated: The letter A is the nature of both of these.

original: a'a li bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: a'a li bsdu ba'o //
translated: The collection of the A's.

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa nyid bsdu ba'i bdag nyid bdag med ma'i 'khor ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa nyid bsdu ba'i bdag nyid bdag med ma'i 'khor ro //
translated: The collection of the retinue of Nairatmya is the indivisibility of means and insight.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
translated: Just as the mandala of Nairatmya, so also is the mandala of Vajradhara.

original: gri gug gi rnam par dag pa bstan pa /🔽nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams //
analyzed: gri gug gi rnam par dag pa bstan pa / nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams //
translated: The teaching of the purity of the curved knife.

original: gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas //🔽zhes pa ni //
analyzed: gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas // zhes pa ni //
translated: The curved knife abides in order to cut the six faults, pride, etc.🔽This is the teaching of the purity of the six faults.

original: nga rgyal dang / gti @94b mug dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / phrag dog dang / phra ma dang nyes pa drug go //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang / gti @94b mug dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / phrag dog dang / phra ma dang nyes pa drug go //
translated: The six faults are pride, delusion, passion, hatred, envy, and slander.

original: de rnams gcad par bya ba'i phyir gri gug gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gcad par bya ba'i phyir gri gug gnas pa'o //
translated: The curved knife abides in order to cut those.

original: 'di ni skyon drug rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni skyon drug rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: This is the purity of the six faults.

original: skyon drug rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: skyon drug rnam par dag pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: The six faults are the five Tathagatas and the purity of Vajrasattva itself is nondual intuition.🔽In the lotus vessel of the head,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi / mgo bo'i padma'i snod du ni /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi / mgo bo'i padma'i snod du ni /
translated: the conceptualization of entity and nonentity,

original: dngos po ni 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni 'khor ba'o //
translated: Entity is samsara.

original: dngos po med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //🔽gnyi ga'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o // gnyi ga'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Nonentity is nirvana.

original: mgo ni de dang po nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: mgo ni de dang po nyid yin pas so //
translated: The absence of conceptualization of both is the head, because it is the beginning of that.

original: padma'i snod ni thod pa'i snod de gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i thod pa'o //
analyzed: padma'i snod ni thod pa'i snod de gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i thod pa'o //
translated: The lotus vessel is the vessel of the skull, the skull of purity as nondual.

original: yang na dngos po ni 'byung ba skyed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dngos po ni 'byung ba skyed pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, entity is the generation of the elements.

original: dngos med ni mi 'byung zhing mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: dngos med ni mi 'byung zhing mi skye ba'o //
translated: Nonentity is the nonarising and nongeneration of those.

original: skye ba nyid mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba nyid mi skye ba'o //
translated: Arising itself is nonarising.

original: de bas na rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the correct realization free from conceptualization.

original: de'i mgo ni de'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mgo ni de'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: Its head is its root.

original: padma'i snod ni ye shes kyi gnas so //
analyzed: padma'i snod ni ye shes kyi gnas so //
translated: The lotus vessel is the abode of intuition.

original: de nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning of “perfect pristine consciousness.”

original: bdud rnams kyi ni bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
analyzed: bdud rnams kyi ni bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
translated: The blood of the four māras should be drunk for the sake of spiritual powers.

original: thod pa khrag gis bkang ba ste //
analyzed: thod pa khrag gis bkang ba ste //
translated: The skull is filled with blood.

original: de la thob pa'i khrag 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de la thob pa'i khrag 'byung ba'o //
translated: The blood of the one who is attained arises there.

original: bdud rnams kyi ni zhes pa ni bdud rnam pa bzhi ste bdud rnam pa bzhi btul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud rnams kyi ni zhes pa ni bdud rnam pa bzhi ste bdud rnam pa bzhi btul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The “four māras” are the four māras.

original: dngos grub phyir ni dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin pas dngos grub kyi rgyur 'thung ba'o //
analyzed: dngos grub phyir ni dngos grub tu 'gyur ba yin pas dngos grub kyi rgyur 'thung ba'o //
translated: “For the sake of spiritual powers” means that it is for the sake of spiritual powers.

original: yang na / sems can dga' bar mi byed pas na bdud de sems can ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: yang na / sems can dga' bar mi byed pas na bdud de sems can ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: Or, since it does not delight sentient beings, it is a māra. Sentient beings are the faculties.

original: de rnams yul la chags pa las dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams yul la chags pa las dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They are delighted by attachment to objects.

original: de bzlog nas kyang dga' ba med cing dga' ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang po rnams yul la bzlog pa 'dis na bdud bzhi'o //
analyzed: de bzlog nas kyang dga' ba med cing dga' ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang po rnams yul la bzlog pa 'dis na bdud bzhi'o //
translated: Having turned that around, there is no delight. Since the faculties are turned away from objects by the four delights, and so on, there are four māras.

original: de rnams kyi de dang 'brel pa'i khrag chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi de dang 'brel pa'i khrag chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Their blood is the characteristic of attachment.

original: 'thung ba ni chags pa med par byed de /
analyzed: 'thung ba ni chags pa med par byed de /
translated: Drinking is without attachment,

original: chags pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it has the nature of nonattachment.

original: lhan cig skyes pa la lhan cig par chags pa yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa la lhan cig par chags pa yang med pa yin no //
translated: There is no attachment to the connate even as connate.🔽For the sake of power,

original: dngos grub phyir ni zhes pa la dngos grub ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: dngos grub phyir ni zhes pa la dngos grub ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: power is the result,

original: phyir ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: phyir ni rgyu'o //
translated: and for the sake is the cause.

original: 'bras bu nyid rgyu yin pas rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid rgyu yin pas rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pa yin no //
translated: Because the result itself is the cause, cause and result are inseparable.

original: de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa la thug pas rgyu'i phyir 'bras bu nyid kyang lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa la thug pas rgyu'i phyir 'bras bu nyid kyang lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of being connate, the result is also connate.

original: stong pa'i rnam @95a * //
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam @95a * //
translated: The form of emptiness is khatvām.

original: pas kha tv'am ga / zhes pa ni kha tv'am ga'i rnam par dag pa bstan te /
analyzed: pas kha tv'am ga / zhes pa ni kha tv'am ga'i rnam par dag pa bstan te /
translated: This teaches the purity of khatvām.

original: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa kha tv'am ga yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa kha tv'am ga yin no //
translated: The sixteen emptinesses are khatvām.

original: yang na aam ga 'gro ba yin pas na lus te /
analyzed: yang na aam ga 'gro ba yin pas na lus te /
translated: Or, since aṅga means “to go,” it is the body.

original: de yang kha tvam ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba yin pas mkha' spyod ma'o //
analyzed: de yang kha tvam ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba yin pas mkha' spyod ma'o //
translated: Moreover, since khatvām means “to go in the sky,” it is the sky-farer.

original: de yang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is emptiness.

original: ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /🔽rnam pas zhes pa ste /🔽ka k'a li'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa / rnam pas zhes pa ste / ka k'a li'o //
translated: It is said:🔽By the vowels and consonants.🔽The vowels are the ka-li.

original: aa a'a li'o //
analyzed: aa a'a li'o //
translated: The consonants are the a-li.

original: de ltar a'a li k'a li gnyis kyi n'a da phreng gnyis po de yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar a'a li k'a li gnyis kyi n'a da phreng gnyis po de yongs su spangs nas /
translated: Thus, having abandoned the two garlands of a-li and ka-li,

original: a'a li k'a li gnyi ga kha sbyor bas gnyi ga dbyer med du rtogs pa'i phyir bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li gnyi ga kha sbyor bas gnyi ga dbyer med du rtogs pa'i phyir bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: because of the realization of the non-duality of both by the union of both the a-li and ka-li, he is Vajradhara, who is non-dual with Nairatmya.

original: thabs kyi ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pa ni /
analyzed: thabs kyi ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pa ni /
translated: The taste of the means is imagined.

original: ro'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa gang ro de chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi thabs nyid kyis rnam par brtag ni yongs su dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: ro'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa gang ro de chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi thabs nyid kyis rnam par brtag ni yongs su dpyad pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the purity of taste is this: that taste, which is the nature of the realm of phenomena, is the means itself. Imagined is thoroughly analyzed.

original: thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid ro'i rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid ro'i rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the means is the purity of taste.

original: yang na chos kyi dbyings thugs so //
analyzed: yang na chos kyi dbyings thugs so //
translated: Or, the realm of phenomena is the mind.

original: thabs 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o ;
analyzed: thabs 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o ;
translated: This means is consciousness.

original: / nye ba ni drung na nye bar bsgyur ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: / nye ba ni drung na nye bar bsgyur ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Near is the wisdom that is transformed into the presence.

original: thabs dbang po dang yul la rag las pa'i phyir dbang po'i yul dang / dbang po dang shes pa brtags pa des yongs su dpyad pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes yang dag pa yin no //
analyzed: thabs dbang po dang yul la rag las pa'i phyir dbang po'i yul dang / dbang po dang shes pa brtags pa des yongs su dpyad pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes yang dag pa yin no //
translated: Because of the dependence on the sense organ and the object, the object of the sense organ, and by that examination of the sense organ and consciousness, the perfect pristine awareness of the indivisibility of the three vajras is the reality.🔽By this,

original: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
translated: having meditated on the wheel,

original: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will quickly attain power.

original: 'dis ni zhes pa ni rim pa 'dis so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes pa ni rim pa 'dis so //
translated: By this means, by this process.

original: 'khor lo ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the yoginī wheel.

original: rnam bsgoms na ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam bsgoms na ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //
translated: Having meditated on it, having entered into union with it.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa des so //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gnyis dbyer med pa des so //
translated: By that, by the indivisibility of the two maṇḍalas, which are the nature of the two realities.

original: myur ba ni myur bar ro //
analyzed: myur ba ni myur bar ro //
translated: Quickly, in a short time.

original: dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
translated: Power is the power of the great seal.

original: thob par 'gyur ni rnal 'byor pas thob par ro //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur ni rnal 'byor pas thob par ro //
translated: One will attain it, the yogin will attain it.

original: yang na 'dis ni ye shes kyis so /'khor lo ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na 'dis ni ye shes kyis so /'khor lo ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i bzhin no //
translated: Or else, this is the knowledge. The wheel is the fifteen yoginis, who are the nature of the five sense faculties, the five sense objects, and the five knowledges.

original: bsgoms ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgoms ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'o //
translated: Meditating is the meditative union.

original: ye shes dang tha mi dad pa nyid de yang 'khor lo yin no //
analyzed: ye shes dang tha mi dad pa nyid de yang 'khor lo yin no //
translated: The knowledge is the wheel, which is non-different from the wheel.

original: de nas myur du ni dngos grub myur du'o //
analyzed: de nas myur du ni dngos grub myur du'o //
translated: Then, quickly is the quick attainment.

original: aa bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: aa bdag med ma'o //
translated: A is the Nairatmya.

original: ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Va is the Vajra Holder, the mind of enlightenment.

original: de ltar gnyi ga ni aa ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar gnyi ga ni aa ba'o //
translated: Thus, both are A.

original: thob par 'gyur ni gnyi ga dbyer med pas khyab pa rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur ni gnyi ga dbyer med pas khyab pa rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One will attain is the pervasion that should be posited by the indivisibility of both.

original: de ltar gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes nyid phyag rgya @95b chen po'i dngos grub yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes nyid phyag rgya @95b chen po'i dngos grub yin no //
translated: Thus, the knowledge of the indivisibility of both is the attainment of the great seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyang mngon par shes pa drug 'byung ba yin pas de gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyang mngon par shes pa drug 'byung ba yin pas de gsungs pa /
translated: The attainment of the great seal is the arising of the six superknowledges, so that is stated.

original: dang po nag po rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: dang po nag po rab tu bsgom //
translated: First, meditate on black.

original: gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom //
translated: Second, meditate on red.

original: gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom //
translated: On the third, he meditates on yellow.

original: bzhi par ljang gu de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi par ljang gu de bzhin no //
translated: On the fourth, he meditates on green.🔽On the fifth, he meditates on blue,

original: lnga par kha dog sngon po dang / drug par dkar po'i lus can te //
analyzed: lnga par kha dog sngon po dang / drug par dkar po'i lus can te //
translated: and on the sixth, he meditates on white.

original: yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi who meditates on the six limbs

original: dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
translated: also meditates on the end of the separation of joy.

original: 'khor lo bsgoms par gyur pa de la dang po kha dog nag po'i 'od zer ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo bsgoms par gyur pa de la dang po kha dog nag po'i 'od zer ro //
translated: In that meditation on the cakras, first there is the light ray of black color.

original: de'i rjes su dmar po'o //🔽de'i rjes su ser po'o //🔽de'i rjes su ljang gu'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su dmar po'o // de'i rjes su ser po'o // de'i rjes su ljang gu'o //
translated: After that, there is the red one.🔽After that, there is the yellow one.🔽After that, there is the green one.

original: de'i rjes la sngon po'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la sngon po'o //
translated: After that, there is the blue one.

original: de'i 'og tu dkar po'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dkar po'o //
translated: After that, there is the white one.

original: 'od zer drug spros pas mngon par shes pa drug la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'od zer drug spros pas mngon par shes pa drug la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtshan ma yin no //
translated: The emission of the six light rays is the sign of the qualities such as the six superknowledges.

original: yan lag drug bsgom ni yan lag drug snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag drug bsgom ni yan lag drug snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The meditation on the six limbs is the meditative concentration on the six limbs.

original: de nyid ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: That itself is the yogi,

original: gnyi ga dbyer med par rtogs par gnas pa'o //🔽de yang ni yan lag drug go //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med par rtogs par gnas pa'o // de yang ni yan lag drug go //
translated: who abides in the realization of the indivisibility of the two.🔽That also is the six limbs.

original: de bzhin ni ji ltar ba bzhin du'o /
analyzed: de bzhin ni ji ltar ba bzhin du'o /
translated: Just as is the case with the six limbs,

original: rnam par dga' ba'i thar ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par dga' ba'i thar ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
translated: The liberation of complete joy is the connate.

original: ji ltar 'od gsal gyi ye shes nyid yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'od gsal gyi ye shes nyid yin no //
translated: It is the pristine consciousness of clear light itself.

original: yang na // nga rgyal la sos skyon drug rnams //
analyzed: yang na // nga rgyal la sos skyon drug rnams //
translated: Again, the six faults of pride

original: gcod pas gri gug rnam par gnas //
analyzed: gcod pas gri gug rnam par gnas //
translated: are severed by the knife.

original: zhes pas nga rgyal la sogs pa'i shes pa drug rnam par dag pas gri gug go //
analyzed: zhes pas nga rgyal la sogs pa'i shes pa drug rnam par dag pas gri gug go //
translated: Since the six consciousnesses, such as pride, are pure, there is a knife.

original: gang mdor bstan pa de nyid rgyas par bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang mdor bstan pa de nyid rgyas par bshad pa yin te /
translated: That is the extensive explanation of the concise explanation.

original: dang po nag por bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dang po nag por bsgom par bya //
translated: First, meditate on black.🔽...

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: up to

original: dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
translated: the end of the separation from joy.

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon drug rnam par dag pas mtshan ma drug 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon drug rnam par dag pas mtshan ma drug 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Since the six faults, such as pride, are pure, the six signs arise.

original: yang na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pas gri gug go //
analyzed: yang na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pas gri gug go //
translated: Again, since pride and so on are pure, there is a knife.🔽The head of the concepts of things and nonthings

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi / mgo bo yi ni padma'i snod //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi / mgo bo yi ni padma'i snod //
translated: is the vessel of the lotus.

original: ces gang bstan pa padma'i snod rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: ces gang bstan pa padma'i snod rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That which is explained as “the vessel of the lotus” is pure.

original: bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
analyzed: bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
translated: The blood of the four demons is drunk for the sake of power.

original: zhes pa gang yang khrag gi rnam par dag pa'o //🔽stong pa'i rnam pas kha tv'am ga / zhes pa ni kha tv'am ga'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gang yang khrag gi rnam par dag pa'o // stong pa'i rnam pas kha tv'am ga / zhes pa ni kha tv'am ga'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purification of blood.🔽The skull is the purification of the skull.

original: thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pas gang ro'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pas gang ro'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The corpse is the purification of the corpse.

original: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
translated: By this, one should meditate on the wheel.

original: zhes pa rnam par dag pa @96a * //
analyzed: zhes pa rnam par dag pa @96a * //
translated: This is the purification of the five.

original: lnga'i bdag nyid mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gang drug pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo de'o //🔽yan lag drug nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon drug rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lnga'i bdag nyid mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gang drug pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo de'o // yan lag drug nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon drug rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The wheel is the nature of the fifteen dakinis, which is the nature of the sixth.

original: gri gug gang nag po'o //
analyzed: gri gug gang nag po'o //
translated: The knife is black because of the purification of the six faults, such as pride.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid yin pas na dang po'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid yin pas na dang po'o //
translated: It is the first because it is nondual intuition.

original: dngos dang dngos med la sogs pa rnam par dag pa las /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med la sogs pa rnam par dag pa las /
translated: From the purification of entity and nonentity, etc.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gnyis pa nyid kyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid las rnam par grol bas dmar ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gnyis pa nyid kyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid las rnam par grol bas dmar ba'o //
translated: It is red because it is free from the characteristic of passion of method and wisdom, due to the nature of the second [stage].

original: bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
analyzed: bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag / dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya //
translated: The blood of the four māras is drunk for the sake of spiritual powers.

original: zhes pas gsum pa rnam par dga' ba'i ngo bo'i skad cig la yul dang dbang po'i chags pa'i btung ba 'thung ba'i phyir ser po'o //
analyzed: zhes pas gsum pa rnam par dga' ba'i ngo bo'i skad cig la yul dang dbang po'i chags pa'i btung ba 'thung ba'i phyir ser po'o //
translated: Thus, it is yellow because it drinks the drink of the passion of the object and sense organ in the third moment, the nature of complete joy.

original: stong pa'i rnam pa kha tv'am ga / zhes pa bzhi pa ljang gu ste /
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam pa kha tv'am ga / zhes pa bzhi pa ljang gu ste /
translated: The form of emptiness is khaṭvāṅga.

original: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi dus su ljang gu ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi dus su ljang gu ste /
translated: The fourth is green, at the time of the nature of the connate.

original: ha byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ha byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Ha is bodhicitta.

original: byang chub kyi sems gsog gsob kyi rang bzhin te gsog dang 'dra bas na gsog ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems gsog gsob kyi rang bzhin te gsog dang 'dra bas na gsog ste /
translated: Bodhicitta is the nature of a hollow reed, and since it is like a hollow reed, it is hollow.

original: nges pa'i tshig gis ljang gu nyid do //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig gis ljang gu nyid do //
translated: By definition, it is green.

original: thabs kyi ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pas de nyid bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa la me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga de la yod pas lnga par kha dog sngon po dang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: thabs kyi ro ni rnam par brtag / ces pas de nyid bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa la me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga de la yod pas lnga par kha dog sngon po dang zhes pa ste /
translated: Since the four realities, the five intuitions such as the mirror intuition, exist in the connate fourth, it is the fifth, the blue color.

original: dkar po dang nag po gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas sngon po nyid do //
analyzed: dkar po dang nag po gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas sngon po nyid do //
translated: Since the white and the black are inseparable in nature, it is blue.

original: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na //
translated: This is the sixth, by the statement “having meditated on the wheel,” etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas drug pa ste drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyu sa dkar po nyid 'od gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas drug pa ste drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyu sa dkar po nyid 'od gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The cause of the sixth, the stage of the vajra holder, is the white color itself, the clearlight transparency.

original: lus ni bsags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus de 'di la yod pas dkar po'i lus can de'i 'khor lo yang dag pa'i ye shes de'i sku dkar po'i lus can no //
analyzed: lus ni bsags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus de 'di la yod pas dkar po'i lus can de'i 'khor lo yang dag pa'i ye shes de'i sku dkar po'i lus can no //
translated: Since the body, the nature of the fifteen yoginis, the body, exists in this, it has a white body. The wheel of that, the intuition of reality, has a white body.

original: de ci 'dra ba cig yin pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci 'dra ba cig yin pas gsungs pa /
translated: Since it is asked what it is like, it is said:

original: a'am ste yi ge aa la sogs pa a'am gi bar du n'a da bco lnga yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro bco lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: a'am ste yi ge aa la sogs pa a'am gi bar du n'a da bco lnga yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro bco lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The vowels, i.e., the letters from a to a, up to i, are the fifteen phonemes.

original: yan lag drug bsgom ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag drug bsgom ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the six limbs is the meditative concentration on the nature of the two truths.

original: rnal 'byor pa de nyid zung 'jug pa la rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de nyid zung 'jug pa la rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: The yogi/nī abides in the state of union.

original: de lta bur gyur pa gang yan lag drug po de slar ci 'dra ba cig yin par bzhi pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa gang yan lag drug po de slar ci 'dra ba cig yin par bzhi pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
translated: What is that state? The fourth gesture is taught:

original: rnam dga' @96b mthar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam dga' @96b mthar yang de bzhin no //
translated: The supreme joy is also the end.

original: zhes pa ni ji ltar bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa de bzhin du yan lag drug gi ye shes yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ji ltar bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa de bzhin du yan lag drug gi ye shes yin no //
translated: Just as the fourth is the innate, so is the gnosis of the six limbs.

original: lhan cig skyes pa dang dbyer med pa nyid me long lta bu sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dang dbyer med pa nyid me long lta bu sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The innate is inseparable from the mirror-like gnosis, etc., which is the gnosis that is the nature of the five gnoses.

original: de ltar kha sbyor nyid du ston par byed pa /
analyzed: de ltar kha sbyor nyid du ston par byed pa /
translated: Thus, it is taught to be the union.

original: 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa //
analyzed: 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa //
translated: The two upper stories are flawless.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa de thams cad nyid 'khor lo gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ci yang med do //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa de thams cad nyid 'khor lo gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ci yang med do //
translated: All of that is the identity of the two nondual wheels, and there is nothing else.

original: de gsungs pa /🔽bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: de gsungs pa / bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni //
translated: That is stated:🔽The stage of generation itself

original: rdzogs pa'i yi ni rim pa nyid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i yi ni rim pa nyid //
translated: and the stage of completion itself,

original: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
translated: in dependence on the two stages,

original: rdo rje can gyis chos bshad do //🔽zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis chos bshad do // zhes pa smos te /
translated: the vajra holder explains the Dharma.

original: rim par bya bar grags pas na rim pa'o //
analyzed: rim par bya bar grags pas na rim pa'o //
translated: The stage is renowned as the process.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i'o //
translated: That is the generation.

original: bskyed pa ni bskyed pa ste //
analyzed: bskyed pa ni bskyed pa ste //
translated: Generation is the creation.

original: de ston cing 'chad pas bskyed pas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid lha'i rnam par yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ston cing 'chad pas bskyed pas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid lha'i rnam par yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The stage of generation is the nature of the wheel that is complete with the form of the deity, which is the identity of the color, hand implements, and shape.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i sgras yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i rnam pa gri gug la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyis gang grags pa de'i rim pa'o //🔽'dir rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //🔽rdo rje can gyis ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes can no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid rdzogs pa'i sgras yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i rnam pa gri gug la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyis gang grags pa de'i rim pa'o // 'dir rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni // rdo rje can gyis ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes can no //
translated: The stage of perfection is the stage of that which is renowned as the nature of the utterly pure reality realm, the utterly pure nature of the forms of the completely perfect deity, such as the flaying knife and so forth.🔽Here, based on the two stages,🔽the vajra holder is the one who has the wisdom of indivisibility.🔽

original: chos bshad do ni chos yang dag par bstan pa'o //🔽yang na rim pa ni rtog pa'i ye shes so //🔽de bskyed pa ni bskyed pa'i sgras kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //🔽tsa'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te gang gi phyir ro //🔽ae'i sgra chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //🔽ba byang chub kyi sems so //🔽gnyi ga dbyer med pa yin te /
analyzed: chos bshad do ni chos yang dag par bstan pa'o //🔽yang na rim pa ni rtog pa'i ye shes so //🔽de bskyed pa ni bskyed pa'i sgras kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //🔽tsa'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te gang gi phyir ro //🔽ae'i sgra chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //🔽ba byang chub kyi sems so //🔽gnyi ga dbyer med pa yin te /

original: don dam pa'i bden pa dang tha mi dad pa nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa dang tha mi dad pa nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no //
translated: The conventional truth is not different from the ultimate truth.

original: rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid //
translated: The stage of perfection itself

original: ces pa la rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgra ni don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ces pa la rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgra ni don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The word “stage” in “stage of perfection” refers to the ultimate truth, which is the perfect pristine awareness.

original: de yang 'ang nyid ni 'ang gi sgra nyid kyi don te /
analyzed: de yang 'ang nyid ni 'ang gi sgra nyid kyi don te /
translated: And also means “itself,” the meaning of the word “itself.”

original: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid kyi ye shes yin no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid kyi ye shes yin no //
translated: It is the pristine awareness of the indivisibility of the two truths.

original: de lta bu'i rim pas gang rim gnyis ni ye shes gnyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rim pas gang rim gnyis ni ye shes gnyis so //
translated: The two stages are the two pristine awarenesses.

original: de la brten nas ni mnyam pa nyid du nges pa'i rdo rje can dbyer med pa'i ye shes can no //
analyzed: de la brten nas ni mnyam pa nyid du nges pa'i rdo rje can dbyer med pa'i ye shes can no //
translated: Based on those, one becomes a vajra holder who is ascertained in equality, one who has the pristine awareness of indivisibility.

original: chos bshad do ni chos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chos bshad do ni chos bstan pa'o //
translated: Explains the Dharma

original: 'di 'dra ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can @97a * //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can @97a * //
translated: means that the Bhagavān, who is the embodiment of the two truths,

original: chos kyi sku yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku yin no //
translated: is the dharmakāya.

original: bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do //
analyzed: bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do //
translated: The generation stage is explained

original: zhes pa ni lung yin pas rtags kyi tshig rang dga' ba med par ma ning gis bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lung yin pas rtags kyi tshig rang dga' ba med par ma ning gis bstan to //
translated: This is the scriptural citation. The words of the reason are not stated explicitly, but are implied.

original: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
translated: In the realm of space, the bhaga is imagined.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: And so forth up to

original: rnam dga' mthar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam dga' mthar yang de bzhin no //
translated: The end of the joy is likewise.

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis bskyed pa'i cha bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis bskyed pa'i cha bstan to //
translated: This teaches the creation aspect.

original: yang na bskyed pa'i cha zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i sgra ni khyad par du gyur pa 'jug cing bskyed pa'i ye shes gsal ba bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i cha zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i sgra ni khyad par du gyur pa 'jug cing bskyed pa'i ye shes gsal ba bdag med ma'o //
translated: Or else, the creation aspect is as follows: The word creation is used for the transformation, and the creation gnosis is the clear selflessness.

original: cha ni bgo skal te me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyis na de'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: cha ni bgo skal te me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyis na de'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Aspect is portion, and since it has the nature of the five gnoses such as mirror-like, it is the Vajra Holder with that nature.

original: bskyed pa yang yin la cha yang yin pas bskyed pa'i cha ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa yang yin la cha yang yin pas bskyed pa'i cha ste /
translated: Since it is both creation and aspect, it is the creation aspect.

original: gnyis su med pa'i phyir na ma ning ngo //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i phyir na ma ning ngo //
translated: Since it is nondual, it is neuter.

original: de 'chad ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: de 'chad ni ston pa'o //
translated: That is explained, that is taught.

original: bshad zin pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cha nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyang bstan pa yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cha nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyang bstan pa yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is also taught that the perfection stage itself is just the aspect of the creation stage that has been explained.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi padma la //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi padma la //
translated: In the lotus of the realm of space,

original: bha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod //
analyzed: bha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod //
translated: The bhaga is called gnosis.

original: ces pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to /
analyzed: ces pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to /
translated: Thus, the completion stage is taught.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi padma la ni chos 'byung sa gzhi'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi padma la ni chos 'byung sa gzhi'o //
translated: The lotus of the realm of space is the source of phenomena, the ground.

original: brten par gyur pa ni bha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod de ye shes so //
analyzed: brten par gyur pa ni bha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod de ye shes so //
translated: The support is called the bhaga, the expression of intuition, intuition.

original: sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug ste /
analyzed: sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug ste /
translated: Meditation is called meditative concentration.

original: mtshungs pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The intuition that enters into sameness is the union of the intuition vajra and the lotus.

original: de'i bde ba ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i ye shes ni 'khor lo brjed do //
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i ye shes ni 'khor lo brjed do //
translated: Its bliss is the intuition of meditative concentration, the wheel.

original: ji ltar rigs pa rang rig nyid ni snyoms par zhugs pa gang gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa rang rig nyid ni snyoms par zhugs pa gang gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The self-knowing itself, as is appropriate, is the intuition of joy, etc., of meditative concentration.

original: de'i rang rig nyid ni bdag nyid rig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang rig nyid ni bdag nyid rig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its self-knowing itself is the essence of self-awareness.

original: lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems //
analyzed: lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems //
translated: The deity is the enlightened mind.

original: zhes pa ni de nyid stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gang de nyid lha yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de nyid stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems gang de nyid lha yin no //
translated: That very thing, the enlightened mind of the indivisibility of emptiness and compassion, is the deity.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin no //
translated: The element is semen.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gnyis te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gnyis te /
translated: Coemergent means twofold.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba'i sgra ni khu bar bshad de /
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba'i sgra ni khu bar bshad de /
translated: The word “arising” refers to semen.

original: khu ba de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: khu ba de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: That semen is coemergent.

original: de ni rgyu de'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: de ni rgyu de'i phyir na'o //
translated: It is so because of that cause.

original: rnam pa gnyis ni lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ni lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: Twofold means the two kinds of coemergence.

original: re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin //
analyzed: re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin //
translated: First, the queen is wisdom.

original: zhes pa ni gang bud med kyi gzugs de re zhig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gang bud med kyi gzugs de re zhig go //
translated: The one who is the form of a woman is first.

original: shes rab ni lhan cig skyes pa yin no //🔽skyes bu thabs su brjod pa yin //
analyzed: shes rab ni lhan cig skyes pa yin no // skyes bu thabs su brjod pa yin //
translated: Wisdom is coemergent.🔽The man is said to be method.

original: zhes pa ni khu ba'i tshul de gang skyes bu yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khu ba'i tshul de gang skyes bu yin no //
translated: The one who is the man is in the manner of semen.

original: 'di'i khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag thabs dang shes @97b rab nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag thabs dang shes @97b rab nyid yin no //
translated: His semen and coemergence are method and wisdom.

original: phyi nas 'dis ni rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: phyi nas 'dis ni rnam pa gnyis //
translated: Later, this is twofold.

original: 'dis zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab re re zhing yang rnam pa gnyis nyid do //🔽kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las //
analyzed: 'dis zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab re re zhing yang rnam pa gnyis nyid do // kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las //
translated: This means that each of method and wisdom is twofold.🔽The division of the relative and the ultimate🔽is the division of the two kinds of coemergence.

original: rnam par nub pa don dam pa'i bden pa lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par nub pa don dam pa'i bden pa lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The ultimate truth is coemergent.

original: kun rdzob ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khu ba'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khu ba'o //
translated: The relative is the semen of the relative truth.

original: re zhig skyes bu'i rnam pa gnyis khu ba 'am de'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: re zhig skyes bu'i rnam pa gnyis khu ba 'am de'i bde ba'o //
translated: The two aspects of the person are the semen or the bliss of that.

original: khu ba dang 'brel ba'i bde ba gang ngo //
analyzed: khu ba dang 'brel ba'i bde ba gang ngo //
translated: It is the bliss connected with the semen.🔽Just as with the person,

original: skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang /
analyzed: skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang /
translated: so also with wisdom,

original: de yi khu ba'am bde ba nyid //
analyzed: de yi khu ba'am bde ba nyid //
translated: its semen or bliss.

original: de nyid phyir na dga' ba ni //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na dga' ba ni //
translated: Therefore, the joy

original: bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yin //🔽bzhi'i zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yin // bzhi'i zhes pa ni /
translated: is the division of the four.

original: rnam mkha'i khams zhes pa gcig gi tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam mkha'i khams zhes pa gcig gi tha tshig go //
translated: The four is the equivalent of the one, the space element.

original: padma la zhes pa ni mang po'i tshig gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: padma la zhes pa ni mang po'i tshig gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: The lotus is the many, which are of the nature of joy.

original: dga' ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas na /
analyzed: dga' ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas na /
translated: Since the joys are also of the nature of wisdom,

original: bzhi'i zhes mo rtags kyis bstan to //🔽gang phyir lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi //
analyzed: bzhi'i zhes mo rtags kyis bstan to // gang phyir lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi //
translated: the four is indicated by the feminine ending.🔽Since there are four types of connate joy,

original: zhes pa ni rgyu gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyu gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: the reason is that there are four types of connate joy.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni /
translated: From the perspective of the completion stage,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo rtogs pas so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo rtogs pas so //
translated: By realizing the wheel of yoginis as the nature of the extremely pure dharmadhatu.

original: dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid ni dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ma ning ngo //
analyzed: dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid ni dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ma ning ngo //
translated: The first joy is the hero, the hero Vajradhara, the neuter, the nondual.

original: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The supreme joy is the yogini.

original: rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma'o //
translated: The yogini is Nairatmya.

original: shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges //
analyzed: shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges //
translated: The extremely blissful joy is certain for all.

original: mdzes pa'i dga' ba ni shin tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i dga' ba ni shin tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The beautiful joy is the extremely blissful joy.

original: nges pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: Certain means certain.

original: gang mtha' dag ni dus mnyam pa nyid du dbang po lnga dang yul rnams gang du der nub pa yin pas shin tu bde ba yang yin la dga' ba yang yin pas shin tu bde dga' ste rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gang mtha' dag ni dus mnyam pa nyid du dbang po lnga dang yul rnams gang du der nub pa yin pas shin tu bde ba yang yin la dga' ba yang yin pas shin tu bde dga' ste rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: Where the five sense organs and objects are simultaneously submerged, that is the extremely blissful joy, the complete joy.

original: de yang kun rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma gnyis dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang kun rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma gnyis dbyer med pa'o //
translated: And that is the nonduality of Vajradhara and Nairatmya.

original: de bde thabs la thams cad rig / de'i phyir rjes su'o //
analyzed: de bde thabs la thams cad rig / de'i phyir rjes su'o //
translated: He is the knower of all means of bliss, therefore he is the subsequent.

original: gang bde ba gang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang bde ba gang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That which is bliss is the innate pristine awareness.

original: thabs byang chub kyi sems khu ba'o //
analyzed: thabs byang chub kyi sems khu ba'o //
translated: The means is the seminal essence of bodhicitta.

original: de gnyi ga nyid thams cad rig pas thams cad rig pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga nyid thams cad rig pas thams cad rig pa'o //
translated: Both of them are the knower of all, because of knowing all.

original: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
analyzed: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
translated: Joy is a little bliss.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: dga' ba dang po nyid ces pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: dga' ba dang po nyid ces pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The first joy is Vajradhara, who is the nature of the relative truth.

original: de cir 'gyur pa yin pa rgyas par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de cir 'gyur pa yin pa rgyas par bshad pa ni /
translated: What is that? The extensive explanation is:

original: bde ba ye shes rnams cung zad //🔽ces pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos @98a * //
analyzed: bde ba ye shes rnams cung zad // ces pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos @98a * //
translated: The pristine awareness of bliss is a little.

original: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbang po dang yul du rtogs pa'i ngo bo kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbang po dang yul du rtogs pa'i ngo bo kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: This is saying that the nature of the utterly pure dharmadhatu, which is the essence of the realization of the sense organ and object, is the pristine awareness that is the nature of the relative truth.

original: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / ces pa ni /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / ces pa ni /
translated: Supreme joy is superior to that.

original: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni gang de'i rgyas bshad do //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni gang de'i rgyas bshad do //
translated: This is saying that the supreme joy is the yoginis, and this is the extensive explanation of that.

original: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: Supreme is superior.

original: dga' ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Joy is innate.

original: de las lhag ni lhag pa lta bur lhag pa ste /
analyzed: de las lhag ni lhag pa lta bur lhag pa ste /
translated: Superior to that is the superior, which is like a superior.

original: de kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes las lhag pa don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes las lhag pa don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
translated: That is the pristine consciousness of the nature of the ultimate truth, superior to the pristine consciousness of the nature of the relative truth.

original: yang na lhag pa ni /
analyzed: yang na lhag pa ni /
translated: Or, the superior is

original: lhag par mnan pas ni lhag pa bde ba'o //
analyzed: lhag par mnan pas ni lhag pa bde ba'o //
translated: the superior bliss of being pressed down.

original: de nyid lhag pa ste 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lhag par gnas pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid lhag pa ste 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lhag par gnas pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That is the superior, which is the pristine consciousness of the innate superior.

original: rnam par dga' ba rnam chags yin //🔽zhes pa ni //🔽shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges //
analyzed: rnam par dga' ba rnam chags yin // zhes pa ni // shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges //
translated: Delight is passion.

original: zhes pa gang de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gang de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of “all certain bliss and joy.”

original: khyad par 'phags pa'i dga' ba ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par 'phags pa'i dga' ba ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: Superior joy is delight.

original: rnam pa yang de yin la dga' ba yang yin pas rnam par dga' ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa yang de yin la dga' ba yang yin pas rnam par dga' ba ste /
translated: Since it is both a type and joy, it is delight.

original: dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is so called because it is the nature of the three joys.

original: rnam chags ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i chags pa'i dga' ba yin pas mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: rnam chags ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i chags pa'i dga' ba yin pas mang po'i tshig go //
translated: Passion is the joy of superior attachment.

original: khyad par du 'phags par dga' bas na khyad par du 'phags par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags par dga' bas na khyad par du 'phags par dga' ba'o //
translated: It is the joy of the special joy because it is the joy of the special joy.

original: yang na rnam par dga' ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na rnam par dga' ba zhes pa ni /
translated: Or, the joy is

original: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dag rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma'i rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa gnyis so //
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dag rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma'i rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa gnyis so //
translated: the joy and supreme joy, which are the nature of Vajradhara and Nairatmya, the two innate joys.

original: de yang dbang po dang yul gyi rang bzhin te gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par shes pa yang bde ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dbang po dang yul gyi rang bzhin te gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par shes pa yang bde ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: That is the nature of the sense organ and object, and because the consciousness is also realized to be the nature of the aspect of bliss by the identity of the inseparability of both, and because the three vajras are inseparable, it is the joy of the special joy.

original: rnam chags yin ni chags pa dang bral bas chags bral te /
analyzed: rnam chags yin ni chags pa dang bral bas chags bral te /
translated: The joy of separation is the separation from attachment.

original: 'dod chags kyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid dbang po dang yul gyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin gcig tu yod pa rnam par shes pa yongs su mthar phyin pa gang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid dbang po dang yul gyis chags pa'i mtshan nyid las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin gcig tu yod pa rnam par shes pa yongs su mthar phyin pa gang ngo //
translated: It is the single nature that is liberated from the characteristics of attachment by desire and the characteristics of attachment by the sense organ and object, which is the complete perfection of consciousness.

original: de yin pa ni 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de yin pa ni 'gyur ba ste /
translated: That is the change.

original: de yang chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: And that is the nature of passion.

original: 'o na gal te 'di lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ci 'dra ba cig ce na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te 'di lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ci 'dra ba cig ce na /
translated: Now, if this is the innate joy, what is it like?

original: lhan cig skyes dga' lhag ma nyid //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' lhag ma nyid //
translated: The remainder is innate joy.

original: lhag ma zhes pa ni bde ba'i rnam par nye bar dmigs pa nyams pa dbang po yul dbyer med par bde ba'i @98b rnam par yongs su gyur pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes pa ni bde ba'i rnam par nye bar dmigs pa nyams pa dbang po yul dbyer med par bde ba'i @98b rnam par yongs su gyur pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The remainder is the loss of the perception of the aspect of bliss, the transformation into the aspect of bliss of the sense organs and objects without differentiation, and the consciousness that is free from the characteristic of passion.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The innate joy is the innate gnosis.

original: bde ba spangs nas de ma yin //
analyzed: bde ba spangs nas de ma yin //
translated: It is not that, abandoning bliss.

original: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: khu ba dang bde ba dag bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa bye brag med pas na 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba 'dres par gyur pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnam par spangs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no / thabs kyi bde ba de kun rig / ces pa gang de'i rgyas
analyzed: khu ba dang bde ba dag bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa bye brag med pas na 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba 'dres par gyur pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnam par spangs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no / thabs kyi bde ba de kun rig / ces pa gang de'i rgyas
translated: The bliss of the method is all-knowing.

original: par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: par bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of that.

original: dang por reg pa 'dod pa dang / reg par 'dod pas 'jug pa'i ye shes dang po'o //
analyzed: dang por reg pa 'dod pa dang / reg par 'dod pas 'jug pa'i ye shes dang po'o //
translated: First, the desire for contact is the pristine wisdom that engages through the desire for contact.

original: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
analyzed: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
translated: Joy is a slight bliss.

original: zhes pa gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o //🔽gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: zhes pa gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o // gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa yin //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of that.

original: zhes pa ni reg pa de la bde bar 'dod pa so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni reg pa de la bde bar 'dod pa so //
translated: Second, the desire for bliss is the desire for that bliss.🔽Supreme joy is superior to that.

original: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / ces pa gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / ces pa gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of that.

original: gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa'i phyir ;
translated: Third, in order to destroy attachment, one should not emit the seminal essence.

original: / dbang po dang yul dbyer med pa thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'i yul dang dbang po'i chags pa dang bral bas 'dod chags 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: / dbang po dang yul dbyer med pa thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'i yul dang dbang po'i chags pa dang bral bas 'dod chags 'jig pa'o //
translated: The destruction of passion is due to the absence of attachment to the object and the sense faculty, because the sense faculty and the object are inseparable, and method and wisdom are not different.

original: de'i phyir dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin //
translated: Therefore, the joy of the absence of joy is the absence of passion.

original: zhes pa de rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa de rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of that.

original: des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
translated: Therefore, one should cultivate the fourth.

original: des na zhes pa ni 'dod chags 'jig pa na ste bde ba'i rnam par yongs su gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa yang yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir 'dod chags nyams pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes pa ni 'dod chags 'jig pa na ste bde ba'i rnam par yongs su gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa yang yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir 'dod chags nyams pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i phyir na'o //
translated: Therefore means when passion is destroyed, because the consciousness that is the transformation of the aspect of bliss also vanishes. The reason for the destruction of passion is because of that.

original: bsgom par bya ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsgom par bya ni snyoms par 'jug par bya ba ste /
translated: One should cultivate means one should enter into union.

original: khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nges par bya'o //
analyzed: khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nges par bya'o //
translated: Since the inseparability of the seminal fluid and the innate is the gnosis of Vajradhara, one should ascertain the innate joy.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' lhag ma nyid //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' lhag ma nyid //
translated: The remainder of the innate joy

original: ces gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces gang de rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: is the extensive explanation of that.

original: da ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin ye shes yin par rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: da ni bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin ye shes yin par rab tu gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to clearly reveal that the vajra-holder is the exalted wisdom inseparable from Nairātmya,

original: mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod //
translated: it is said, “The supreme joy is said to be existence.”

original: mchog tu dga' ba gang de las byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes te /🔽mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba gang de las byung ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes te / mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The supreme joy is the exalted wisdom of the vajra-holder of the relative truth, which arises from that.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said, “The supreme joy is the yoginī.”

original: da ni de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes su gyur pa las dbyer med pa'i 'di gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin @99a * //
analyzed: da ni de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes su gyur pa las dbyer med pa'i 'di gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin @99a * //
translated: Now, from the exalted wisdom of the vajra-holder, which is inseparable from that, the exalted wisdom of the nature of both of them is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: gyis dga' ba bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas thabs dang shes rab dag kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gyis dga' ba bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas thabs dang shes rab dag kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the divisions of the four joys are inseparable from method and wisdom.

original: dga' ba bzhi yin pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa nyid yin pa de gsungs /
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi yin pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa nyid yin pa de gsungs /
translated: It is said that the four joys are inseparable from the exalted wisdom of simultaneously born joy.

original: rnam par dga' las mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: rnam par dga' las mya ngan 'das //
translated: It is said, “From the supreme joy, nirvāṇa.”

original: khyad par du 'phags par chags pa'i mtshan nyid don dam pa'i bden pas bdag med pa'i ye shes srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa gang ngo //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags par chags pa'i mtshan nyid don dam pa'i bden pas bdag med pa'i ye shes srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa gang ngo //
translated: The characteristic of the ultimate truth, which is the exalted wisdom of selflessness, is the inseparability of cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de //🔽'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs //
analyzed: dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de // 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs //
translated: The mere joy of the middle is the middle.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is abandoned by the connate.🔽This is the mere joy in the middle, which is the cause of that exalted wisdom of bliss alone.

original: gang de bar ma bar ma na dga' ba tsam de 'ba' zhig bde ba'i ye shes de'i rgyu nyid las mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa rnams skyes pa kun thun mong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang de bar ma bar ma na dga' ba tsam de 'ba' zhig bde ba'i ye shes de'i rgyu nyid las mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa rnams skyes pa kun thun mong pa nyid do //
translated: From that, the supreme joy and so forth are born, which are common to all.

original: de'i lhan cig skyes pa ni gang bzhi pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i lhan cig skyes pa ni gang bzhi pa de yang ngo //
translated: The connate of that is the fourth.

original: 'di rnams kyis ni gsum po rnams kyis spangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni gsum po rnams kyis spangs pa ste /
translated: These three are abandoned by the fourth.🔽Since these three also enter into that as its nature, they are not observed.

original: gsum po 'di yang de ru de'i bdag nyid kyis de ru zhugs pa las mi dmigs pas na rnam pa sna tshogs 'di rnams kyis spangs nas yongs su btang ste /
analyzed: gsum po 'di yang de ru de'i bdag nyid kyis de ru zhugs pa las mi dmigs pas na rnam pa sna tshogs 'di rnams kyis spangs nas yongs su btang ste /
translated: Therefore, having abandoned these three, they are relinquished.

original: dga' ba gsum po lhan cig skyes pa la rag las pa yin te /
analyzed: dga' ba gsum po lhan cig skyes pa la rag las pa yin te /
translated: The three joys depend on the connate fourth.

original: de nyid kyi khongs su 'di thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi khongs su 'di thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all of this is included within that.

original: yang na mchog tu dga' ba srid pa zhes pa ni yang dag par chags pa'i mtshan nyid gang de srid pa rtag pa'i ye shes so ;
analyzed: yang na mchog tu dga' ba srid pa zhes pa ni yang dag par chags pa'i mtshan nyid gang de srid pa rtag pa'i ye shes so ;
translated: Or else, the supreme joy is existence, which is the characteristic of true desire, that is the eternal intuition of existence.

original: / dga' bral chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang de yang dga' ba dang bral ba'i chad pa'o //
analyzed: / dga' bral chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang de yang dga' ba dang bral ba'i chad pa'o //
translated: The separation from joy is the characteristic of non-desire, that is the annihilation of separation from joy.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa rtag pa dang chad pa dag gnyi ga dang gang bral ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa rtag pa dang chad pa dag gnyi ga dang gang bral ba'o //
translated: Existence and nirvana are both eternal and annihilation, from which one is separated.

original: bar ma ni bar ma ste /
analyzed: bar ma ni bar ma ste /
translated: The middle is the middle.

original: de yang dga' ba tsam ye shes 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: de yang dga' ba tsam ye shes 'ba' zhig go //
translated: And that is the mere joy, the intuition alone.

original: de la yang mtshan ma la spyod pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la yang mtshan ma la spyod pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
translated: And that also occurs as the practice of signs.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang de'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang de'o //
translated: The innate is the intuition of perfect buddhahood.

original: 'di rnams kyis spangs ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis spangs ni /
translated: By these, one is separated from

original: rtag pa dang chad par dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes pa gang de gsum po 'di rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rtag pa dang chad par dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes pa gang de gsum po 'di rnams kyis so //
translated: the innate, which is free from eternalism and annihilationism.

original: ji ltar zhe na spangs pa ste khyad par du yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na spangs pa ste khyad par du yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: How? By abandonment, that is, by thorough abandonment.

original: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa nyid dga' ba bzhin du 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa nyid dga' ba bzhin du 'byung ste /
translated: This is the innate nature, like joy, which arises🔽because of the nature of the four drops.

original: thig le bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: thig le bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: The sixteen kinds of emptiness are the innate pristine awareness.

original: dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid //
analyzed: dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid //
translated: The first joy is the nature of the hero.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa bzhis mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa bzhis mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the brief explanation by the four lines beginning with “The first joy is the nature of the hero.”

original: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
analyzed: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de //
translated: The slight joy is bliss.

original: zhes @99b bya ba la sogs pa bzhis rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: zhes @99b bya ba la sogs pa bzhis rgyas par bshad do //
