translated: How is that?

original: sems nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sems nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The mind itself is pure.

original: sems gcig pu tsam gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad sems las phyi rol du gyur pa gzhan snang ba ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems gcig pu tsam gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad sems las phyi rol du gyur pa gzhan snang ba ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because all phenomena are the nature of the mind alone, there is nothing at all that appears as something external and different from the mind.

original: sems nyid 'ba' zhig de dang de'i rnam par snang ba yin no //
analyzed: sems nyid 'ba' zhig de dang de'i rnam par snang ba yin no //
translated: The mind itself appears in those various forms.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa'i /
analyzed: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa'i /
translated: External objects as imagined by the childish

original: phyi rol don ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: phyi rol don ni yod ma yin //
translated: Do not exist.

original: bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems //
analyzed: bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems //
translated: The mind disturbed by habitual tendencies

original: don du snang bar rab tu byung /
analyzed: don du snang bar rab tu byung /
translated: Arises as the appearance of objects.

original: gzhan las kyang /
analyzed: gzhan las kyang /
translated: And also elsewhere:

original: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
analyzed: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
translated: Whatever things

original: mi rnams yid ni sbyar gyur na //
analyzed: mi rnams yid ni sbyar gyur na //
translated: People’s minds are attached to,

original: de ni de rang bzhin 'gyur te //
analyzed: de ni de rang bzhin 'gyur te //
translated: They become the nature of that,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin //
translated: Like a gem with various forms.

original: de'i phyir thams cad sems tsam nyid yin pas sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad sems tsam nyid yin pas sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since everything is mind only, the mind is pure.

original: reg byed chos kyang med do //
analyzed: reg byed chos kyang med do //
translated: There is no tactile object either.

original: cis khyad par 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad par 'phags she na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purity of mind.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: rnam dag pas te /
analyzed: rnam dag pas te /
translated: By purity.

original: khams gsum rnam par dag pa nyid sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par dag pa nyid sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the three realms is the purity of mind.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir 'gro la 'gro bar shes te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir 'gro la 'gro bar shes te /
translated: Therefore, because of its natural purity, it is known as going to the world.

original: 'gro bar shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'gro bar shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is the very aspect of knowing going.🔽Or,

original: yang na / de'i phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med //
analyzed: yang na / de'i phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med //
translated: therefore, there is no sound, no form.

original: ro med sems nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ro med sems nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: There is no taste, no mind, and complete purity.

original: 'dis ni dri la sogs pa bkag pa las sems kyang rnam par dag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni dri la sogs pa bkag pa las sems kyang rnam par dag pa yin te /
translated: This shows that because of the negation of smell and so on, the mind is also completely pure.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i dag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i dag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: It is the gnosis of the completely pure dharmadhatu, the purity that is superior.

original: reg med chos med ces pa ni /
analyzed: reg med chos med ces pa ni /
translated: There is no touch, no dharma.

original: bde ba la sogs par nyams su myong ba yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs par nyams su myong ba yang med pa yin no //
translated: There is no experience of pleasure and so on.

original: thams cad rnam dag pas /
analyzed: thams cad rnam dag pas /
translated: Everything is completely pure.

original: rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: It is completely pure.

original: rnam par ma dag pa ni ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par ma dag pa ni ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is nothing at all that is impure.

original: des na dngos @111a * //
analyzed: des na dngos @111a * //
translated: Therefore,

original: po thams cad kyi //
analyzed: po thams cad kyi //
translated: the purity of all things

original: dag pa de bzhin nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: dag pa de bzhin nyid du 'dod //
translated: is held to be thusness.

original: ces pa sngar bstan pa'i don nyid bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ces pa sngar bstan pa'i don nyid bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This verse summarizes the meaning of what has been taught above.

original: 'dis ni rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la de'i phyir 'gro bar shes te /
analyzed: 'dis ni rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la de'i phyir 'gro bar shes te /
translated: By this, one should understand that the world, which is pure by nature, is the world of that purity,

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i thams cad nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa yin no //
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i thams cad nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa yin no //
translated: because all things, such as the stable and the moving, are inseparable from the perfect pristine awareness.

original: de skad du yang /🔽'di dag thams cad sems tsam du //
analyzed: de skad du yang / 'di dag thams cad sems tsam du //
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The Sage has taught that all this

original: thub pa yis ni bstan pa dag / skrag pa yongs su spang phyir te //
analyzed: thub pa yis ni bstan pa dag / skrag pa yongs su spang phyir te //
translated: is mind only, in order to eliminate fear.

original: byis pa rnams kyi de nyid med //
analyzed: byis pa rnams kyi de nyid med //
translated: The childish do not know reality.

original: ces pa'o // rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa'o // rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o //
translated: This concludes the ninth chapter, on the stages of purification.

original: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bo dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa nyid kyi gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par dag pa de gang
analyzed: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bo dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa nyid kyi gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par dag pa de gang
translated: What is the special purity that exists in the mandala inseparable from Vajradhara, who is inseparable from Nairātmya, and the wheel of the nature of the fifteen yoginīs inseparable from the mandala that is the nature of the nine principals?

original: la yod pa'i rim par phye ba de ni rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o //
analyzed: la yod pa'i rim par phye ba de ni rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o //
translated: That is the purity division, the ninth.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par bshad pa rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las le'u dgu pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par bshad pa rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa las le'u dgu pa'o /
translated: This concludes chapter nine of the commentary on the glorious tantra of Cakrasaṃvara, called “The Shining Lamp.”

original: // / rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par byed pa rnal 'byor ma'i rim par phye bas dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi
analyzed: // / rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par byed pa rnal 'byor ma'i rim par phye bas dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi
translated: When meditating on the utterly pure reality that is the nature of the utterly pure sphere of reality that is the purity of the two stages, the stage of yoginīs is the means of attaining the mahāmudrā siddhi of the two maṇḍalas.

original: kha sbyar ba las de gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa rnam pa'i rim par phye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: kha sbyar ba las de gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa rnam pa'i rim par phye ba bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the division of the two stages that are the nature of both of those two from the union,

original: da ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba bstan pa'i phyir 'chad de /
analyzed: da ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba bstan pa'i phyir 'chad de /
translated: now, in order to explain the division of the stage of conferring empowerment on the disciples, [the following] is said.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gang dbang bskur ba thob pa la de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gis na /
analyzed: gang dbang bskur ba thob pa la de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gis na /
translated: The words “the reality should be taught to those who have obtained empowerment”

original: dbang ma thob pa la de kho na nyid bstan par mi nus la /
analyzed: dbang ma thob pa la de kho na nyid bstan par mi nus la /
translated: indicate that it is not possible to teach reality to those who have not obtained empowerment.

original: dbang yang dkyil 'khor dang bral na dbang bskur bar mi nus pas na dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur bdag gi cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbang yang dkyil 'khor dang bral na dbang bskur bar mi nus pas na dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur bdag gi cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Since it is not possible to confer empowerment without a maṇḍala, the maṇḍala and the rite of empowerment are explained.

original: de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: Then, just as the stage of the maṇḍala

original: rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad //
analyzed: rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad //
translated: is perfectly explained,

original: gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i //
analyzed: gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i //
translated: the rite of conferring empowerment

original: cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya //🔽zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya // zhes pa smos te /
translated: on the disciples is also explained.

original: de nas ni rjes thogs nyid du gzhan gyis bar ma chad pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nas ni rjes thogs nyid du gzhan gyis bar ma chad pa nyid du'o //
translated: Then, immediately after, without interruption by another,

original: de bas na 'di'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba las dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'di'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba las dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Therefore, for this reason, the mandala is explained in the section on the stages of purification.

original: cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ba'o //
translated: The rite is also explained, the explanation of the mandala rite.

original: gang gis @111b ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas so //
analyzed: gang gis @111b ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas so //
translated: By what? By the mandala rite.

original: slob ma dbang bskur ba na mtshon par byed pas dbang ste dbang de 'chad do //
analyzed: slob ma dbang bskur ba na mtshon par byed pas dbang ste dbang de 'chad do //
translated: When the disciple is initiated, it is the initiation that is explained, since it is indicated.

original: de yang cho ga bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang cho ga bshad par bya'o //
translated: And that also should be explained in the rite.

original: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la dbang bskur ba med la dbang bskur ba ma thob pas /
analyzed: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la dbang bskur ba med la dbang bskur ba ma thob pas /
translated: By this, there is no initiation for one who has not seen the mandala, and without obtaining initiation,

original: de kho na nyid mi thob la de kho na nyid med par ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid mi thob la de kho na nyid med par ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the reality is not obtained, and without reality, there is no Great Seal attainment.

original: dngos grub kyi phyir /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi phyir /
translated: For the sake of attainment,

original: de kho na nyid thob par bya zhing //
analyzed: de kho na nyid thob par bya zhing //
translated: the reality should be obtained,

original: de'i don du dbang bskur la /
analyzed: de'i don du dbang bskur la /
translated: and for that purpose, the initiation,

original: dbang bskur gyi don du dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: dbang bskur gyi don du dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: and for the sake of initiation, the mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi don nyid gsungs pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi don nyid gsungs pa //
translated: The meaning of the mandala itself is stated:

original: dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: First, the deity's nature,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyar  //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyar  //
translated: The yogi should join the earth.

original: aom raksha raksha zhes pas sbyang ba'i sngags kyis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom raksha raksha zhes pas sbyang ba'i sngags kyis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra Om rakṣa rakṣa, the earth should be purified.

original: dang po ni thog ma'o //
analyzed: dang po ni thog ma'o //
translated: The first is the beginning.

original: lha'i bdag nyid ni gang la lha'i bdag nyid yod pa de ni lha'i bdag nyid de slob dpon nyid lha'i tshul gyi sku yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: lha'i bdag nyid ni gang la lha'i bdag nyid yod pa de ni lha'i bdag nyid de slob dpon nyid lha'i tshul gyi sku yin pa'i don to //
translated: The divine nature is that which has a divine nature, and that is the divine nature. The master himself is the body of the divine mode, which is the meaning.

original: yang na nor 'dzin ni chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yang na nor 'dzin ni chos 'byung ngo //
translated: Or, the earth is the source of phenomena.

original: sbyang ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyis rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyang ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyis rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Purification should be established by the nature of the extremely pure dharmadhatu.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa dang / lha'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa dang / lha'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The yogi is the purity of suchness and the purity of the deity.

original: dang po zhes pa ni gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes pa ni gnyis med pa'o //
translated: The first is non-dual.

original: ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du lha'i bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du lha'i bdag nyid yin te /
translated: Just as it is, it is the divine nature.

original: rnal 'byor pa gang la lha'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes yod pa de ni lha'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa ste ye shes lnga dang / sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gnyi ga rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gang la lha'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes yod pa de ni lha'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa ste ye shes lnga dang / sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gnyi ga rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku yin pa'i don to //
translated: The yogi who has the intuition of the deity is the yogi of the deity, which means that he has the intuition body which is pure of both the five intuitions and the three bodies.

original: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can //🔽byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri //
analyzed: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can // byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri //
translated: Having made the vajra from the syllable hum with effort,🔽then draw the mandala.

original: nor 'dzin sbyangs pa'i de ma thag tu rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nor 'dzin sbyangs pa'i de ma thag tu rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Immediately after purifying the earth goddess, the yogi should draw the mandala.

original: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can //
analyzed: 'bad pas h'um las rdo rje can //
translated: Having made the vajra from the syllable hum with effort,

original: zhes pa ni ram las nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i gur dang / rdo rje'i thog phub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ram las nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i gur dang / rdo rje'i thog phub pa'o //
translated: means that having previously visualized the sun from the syllable ram,🔽in the sequence beginning with the vajra ground, the vajra tent, and the vajra ceiling,

original: 'dis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang bsgoms nas de'i nang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang bsgoms nas de'i nang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya'o //
translated: one should visualize the celestial mansion which is of the nature of vajra, and draw the mandala inside it.

original: yang na h'um las rdo rje can ni yi ge h'um dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med mar byas pa'o //
analyzed: yang na h'um las rdo rje can ni yi ge h'um dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med mar byas pa'o //
translated: Or else, “having the vajra from HŪṀ” means Vajradhara, who is inseparable from the syllable HŪṀ, and Nairātmyā.

original: phyi nas ni rjes thogs su bar ma chad par ro //
analyzed: phyi nas ni rjes thogs su bar ma chad par ro //
translated: “Afterwards” means immediately, without interruption.

original: dkyil 'khor ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The “maṇḍala” is the perfect pristine consciousness.

original: bri ba ni /
analyzed: bri ba ni /
translated: “Drawing” means

original: rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pas rnam par gzhag pa'o //🔽dkyil 'khor @112a * //
analyzed: rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pas rnam par gzhag pa'o // dkyil 'khor @112a * //
translated: always being blessed and established.

original: bri ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: bri ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: The place for drawing the maṇḍala is stated:

original: tshal dang skye bos dben pa'i gnas //
analyzed: tshal dang skye bos dben pa'i gnas //
translated: In a forest, a secluded place,🔽in the abodes of bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams dang // dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams dang // dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang //
translated: and in the interior of a maṇḍala house,

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs //
translated: one should erect the excellent maṇḍala.

original: dam pa ni mchog go //
analyzed: dam pa ni mchog go //
translated: “Excellent” means supreme.

original: yang na tshal ni ye shes rig pa de las byung bas spro ba'i ye shes de yod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na tshal ni ye shes rig pa de las byung bas spro ba'i ye shes de yod pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, since the forest is the place of origin of the pristine consciousness of the knowledge of wisdom, that pristine consciousness of emanation exists there.

original: dben pa zhes pa ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa zhes pa ni bral ba'o //
translated: “Secluded” means free.

original: skye bo ni dbang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo ni dbang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: “People” are the sense organs, and so on.

original: gang la der dben pas bsdu ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang la der dben pas bsdu ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Since there is seclusion from that, it is the pristine consciousness of the retinue.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams dang // zhes pa ni tshal ni ljon shing sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams dang // zhes pa ni tshal ni ljon shing sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi ste //
translated: The forest is the ground endowed with various trees.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the place of consecration.

original: skye bos dben pa ni skye bo gags byed pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: skye bos dben pa ni skye bo gags byed pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Secluded from people means free from people who are obstacles.

original: gnas zhes pa ni sa phyogs so //
analyzed: gnas zhes pa ni sa phyogs so //
translated: The place is the area.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams su //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams su //
translated: In the abodes of the Bodhisattvas.

original: zhes pa ni skal pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo gnas na dben pa'i gnas kyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni skal pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo gnas na dben pa'i gnas kyang ngo //
translated: The abodes of fortunate people are also secluded places.

original: gnas 'di rnams dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bya ste de'i nang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas 'di rnams dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bya ste de'i nang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya'o //
translated: These places are the mandala house, and the mandala should be erected inside it.

original: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Enlightenment is nonconceptual wisdom.

original: sems dpa' ni srid pa gsum gcig pa ste srid gsum dbyer med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni srid pa gsum gcig pa ste srid gsum dbyer med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The being is the oneness of the three existences, the nonconceptual wisdom of the inseparability of the three existences.

original: de'i khyim rnams ni gnas rnams te /
analyzed: de'i khyim rnams ni gnas rnams te /
translated: Their abodes are the places.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi gnas 'di rnams su'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi gnas 'di rnams su'o //
translated: In these abodes of nonconceptual intuition.

original: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi gnas gang de rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i yongs su bcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi gnas gang de rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i yongs su bcad par mi nus so //
translated: And in the interior of the mandala palace, that abode of pure intuition, it is impossible to delimit it as the abandonment of all conceptualization and discursive thought.

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs ni khyab pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs ni khyab pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The one who creates the excellent mandala is the vajra-holder, because of his pervasiveness.

original: dam pa ni mchog gtso bo ste nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam pa ni mchog gtso bo ste nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Excellent means supreme, foremost, because it is not the domain of sravakas, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ba'i phyir rdul tshon gsungs pa /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ba'i phyir rdul tshon gsungs pa /
translated: The colored powders for creating the mandala are stated:

original: rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni //
analyzed: rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni //
translated: The excellent colored powders,

original: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te //
analyzed: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te //
translated: Or even the middling ones,🔽The powders of the five precious substances,

original: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // yang na 'bras la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // yang na 'bras la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or even rice, etc.

original: dam pa ni lhar byin gyis brlabs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa ni lhar byin gyis brlabs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The excellent ones are the pure ones of Vairocana, etc., consecrated as deities.

original: rdul tshon ni rdul tshon gyis so //
analyzed: rdul tshon ni rdul tshon gyis so //
translated: The colored powders are the colored powders.

original: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // zhes pa ni /
translated: And with the powders of the five precious substances.

original: aindra n'i la dang / mu tig dang / beed'u rya dang / chu shes dang / ma rgad la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: aindra n'i la dang / mu tig dang / beed'u rya dang / chu shes dang / ma rgad la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Indranīla, pearl, lapis lazuli, crystal, coral, and so on.

original: yang na mu men dang / dung dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i phye ma @112b rnams kyis so //
analyzed: yang na mu men dang / dung dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i phye ma @112b rnams kyis so //
translated: Or with the powders of sapphire, conch, coral, gold, silver, and so on.

original: yang na zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ni /
translated: Or.🔽🔽

original: phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan no //
translated: another way.

original: 'bras la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras la sogs pa ni /
translated: Rice and so on,

original: 'bras dang gro la sogs pa rnams kyis te de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa'i kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so //🔽yang na dam pa zhes pa ni dam pa dbang po rnams te /
analyzed: 'bras dang gro la sogs pa rnams kyis te de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa'i kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so // yang na dam pa zhes pa ni dam pa dbang po rnams te /
translated: with rice, wheat, and so on, with the nature of the five colors of the five transcendent ones.🔽Or, the best,

original: de rnams kyi gtso bo sems yin pas dam pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bo sems yin pas dam pa'o //
translated: the best are the senses, and since the mind is the chief of them, it is the best.

original: de yis dga' ba gtong bar byed pas na dam pas ra'o //
analyzed: de yis dga' ba gtong bar byed pas na dam pas ra'o //
translated: Since it causes the emission of bliss, it is the best

original: de yang 'dir chu yin pas dam pa'i tshul can no //
analyzed: de yang 'dir chu yin pas dam pa'i tshul can no //
translated: of those, and since it is water here, it is the best🔽of those.

original: de yang dbang po dang shes pa yul la rag las pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang dbang po dang shes pa yul la rag las pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa yin pa'i don to //
translated: Moreover, the meaning is that the three vajras are inseparable, since the sense faculties and consciousness depend on the object.

original: de la yod pas kha ni chos 'byung las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de la yod pas kha ni chos 'byung las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: There, the mouth is the wisdom that arises from the dharmodaya, which is the nature of the dharmadhātu.

original: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te ni aa bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te ni aa bdag med ma'o //
translated: Or, “with the middle” means “with Ā, the Nairātmya.”

original: tha mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: tha mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: “A” is Akṣobhya.

original: ba byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ba byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: “Va” is bodhicitta.

original: a'a bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: a'a bdag med ma'o //
translated: “Ā” is Nairātmya.

original: go rims dang go rims las bzlog pas spro ba dang bsdu ba dang bsdu ba dang spro ba'i bdag nyid des gnyi ga dbyer med pas na yongs su gcod par mi nus pa'i phyir rgyu des na 'bring po'o //
analyzed: go rims dang go rims las bzlog pas spro ba dang bsdu ba dang bsdu ba dang spro ba'i bdag nyid des gnyi ga dbyer med pas na yongs su gcod par mi nus pa'i phyir rgyu des na 'bring po'o //
translated: Since both are inseparable through the process of emanating and gathering in sequence and out of sequence, they cannot be defined. For that reason, it is “the middle.”

original: 'ang gi sgras ni khyad par gyi don te /
analyzed: 'ang gi sgras ni khyad par gyi don te /
translated: The word “also” has the meaning of a distinction.

original: 'di lta bu nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyad can yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyad can yin pa'o //
translated: It is distinguished by being superior in this way.

original: rin chen lnga'i zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rin chen lnga'i zhes pa ni /
translated: “The five jewels”

original: lnga'i sgras dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: lnga'i sgras dbang po rnams so //
translated: are the sense organs.

original: rin chen ni sems so //
analyzed: rin chen ni sems so //
translated: “Jewel” is the mind.

original: dngos ni de rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: dngos ni de rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur bas so //
translated: The actual [means] is that they are transformed into those [vajras].

original: phye ma zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phye ma zhes pa ni /
translated: The powder

original: rdul phra rab dang mtshungs par bshad pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil gtibs pas so //
analyzed: rdul phra rab dang mtshungs par bshad pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil gtibs pas so //
translated: is because it is explained as being similar to atoms, and because it is collected in the middle of space.

original: yang na gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis so //
analyzed: yang na gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis so //
translated: Or, [it is] by the gnosis that is the inseparability of both.

original: 'bras la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: 'bras la sogs pas ni /
translated: The rice, etc.

original: yang na 'bras la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na 'bras la sogs pa yin te /
translated: are also rice, etc.

original: ji ltar 'bras ni /
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras ni /
translated: Just as rice

original: bsnun pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying po nyid kyis rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: bsnun pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying po nyid kyis rnam par gzhag go //
translated: is established by its essence, because it is free from being struck,

original: de bzhin du sgro btags pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgro btags pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: in the same way, because it is free from the obscurations of superimposition, etc.,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: [it is] the nature of the extremely pure dharmadhātu.

original: de lta bu gyur pa'i la sogs pa rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: de lta bu gyur pa'i la sogs pa rnams kyis ni /
translated: Those [vajras] that have become like that, etc.

original: ka bde ba zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: ka bde ba zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: are the gnosis that has the characteristic of undefiled bliss.

original: de nyid dang po gtso bo'i rgyu gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de gnyi ga rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid dang po gtso bo'i rgyu gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de gnyi ga rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the pristine wisdom of the Vajra Holder, whose nature is the two mandalas, is the cause of both of those, and is the cause of the principal one in the beginning.

original: dkyil 'khor bya ba'i tshad gsungs pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bya ba'i tshad gsungs pa //
translated: The measure of the mandala is stated:

original: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa ru bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa ru bya //
translated: The mandala should be three cubits.

original: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa bzhi //
analyzed: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa bzhi //
translated: It should be four cubits, with three finger-widths added.

original: khru gsum zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir //🔽@113a * // sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo //
analyzed: khru gsum zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir // @113a * // sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo //
translated: The three cubits is for the sake of the purity of Akṣobhya.🔽One cubit is twenty-four finger-widths.

original: sor mo yang nas bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sor mo yang nas bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
translated: A finger-width is the measure of four barley seeds.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga khru gsum tshad do //🔽mthe bong gsum gyis lhag pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga khru gsum tshad do // mthe bong gsum gyis lhag pa ni //
translated: Thus, the measure is three cubits in both ways.🔽It should be four finger-widths more.

original: khru re re zhing yang sor mo gsum gsum bsnan par bya'o //
analyzed: khru re re zhing yang sor mo gsum gsum bsnan par bya'o //
translated: Each cubit should be increased by three finger-widths.

original: mthe bo'i tshad ni bzhi zhes pa ste nas bzhi'i tshad do //
analyzed: mthe bo'i tshad ni bzhi zhes pa ste nas bzhi'i tshad do //
translated: The measure of a finger-width is four barley seeds.

original: yang na dkyil 'khor khru gsum zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na dkyil 'khor khru gsum zhes pa ni /
translated: Or, the mandala should be three cubits.

original: gsum gyi sgras sku gsung thugs so //
analyzed: gsum gyi sgras sku gsung thugs so //
translated: The three are body, speech, and mind.

original: khru'i sgra ni lnga'i bdag nyid gnyi ga dbang po dang yul gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: khru'i sgra ni lnga'i bdag nyid gnyi ga dbang po dang yul gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: The word “handspan” is the nature of five, the circle of both the sense organ and the object.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo sems zhes bya ba'i ye shes yin te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo sems zhes bya ba'i ye shes yin te /
translated: The circle is the mind, which is called the “chief of the maṇḍala.”

original: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes su bya'o ;
analyzed: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes su bya'o ;
translated: It is the gnosis, which is the nature of the three bodies and the five gnoses, the true gnosis.

original: /'di nyid 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: /'di nyid 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the cause of the result, perfect enlightenment.

original: de nyid cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
analyzed: de nyid cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa'o //
translated: It is superior by three finger lengths.

original: gsum gyi sgras ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di'i cha gsum yin te /
analyzed: gsum gyi sgras ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di'i cha gsum yin te /
translated: The three are the three parts of this connate gnosis,

original: dga' ba la sogs pa rnam par dag ba'i mthar ro //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa rnam par dag ba'i mthar ro //
translated: which is the ultimate purity of joy, and so on.

original: de las mthe bos lhag pa ni /
analyzed: de las mthe bos lhag pa ni /
translated: Superior to that by three finger lengths

original: mthe bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: mthe bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: is the thumb, which is Vajradhara.

original: de la lhag pa ni mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de la lhag pa ni mtshan pa'o //
translated: Superior to that is the sign.

original: ka bde ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ka bde ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Ka is the gnosis of bliss.

original: de nas bzhi pa lan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas bzhi pa lan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Then, the fourth is called “arisen once. ”

original: de la dkyil 'khor du rig ma gzhug pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor du rig ma gzhug pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: The introduction of the consort into the mandala is stated:

original: de ni rigs lnga las byung ba //
analyzed: de ni rigs lnga las byung ba //
translated: The good consort who has arisen from the five clans🔽is introduced into the mandala.

original: rig ma bzang po rnam par gzhug / rig ma zhes pa ni shes rab btsun mo'o //
analyzed: rig ma bzang po rnam par gzhug / rig ma zhes pa ni shes rab btsun mo'o //
translated: The consort is the wisdom queen.

original: de ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: She is to be introduced into the mandala.

original: bzang mo ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bzang mo ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Good means endowed with the yoga of the deity.

original: rigs lnga las byung ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs lnga las skyes so //
analyzed: rigs lnga las byung ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs lnga las skyes so //
translated: Arisen from the five clans means arisen from the five clans of Vajra and so on.

original: yang na rigs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: yang na rigs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: Alternatively, clan means Nairatmya.

original: der zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes der ro //
analyzed: der zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes der ro //
translated: There means in that authentic gnosis.

original: rab tu gzhug ni rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gzhug ni rab tu gsal ba'o //
translated: Introduced means made clear.

original: gzhug ni de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhug ni de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: Introduced means abiding in the nature of that.

original: bzang mo zhes pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bzang mo zhes pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Good means endowed with the yoga of the deity.

original: bsdu ba'i rang bzhin can 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i rang bzhin can 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
translated: She is not only of the nature of gathering,

original: spro ba'i rang bzhin can yang de'o //
analyzed: spro ba'i rang bzhin can yang de'o //
translated: but also of the nature of emanating.

original: de bas na rigs lnga las byung ni rigs lnga rnams ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnams so //
analyzed: de bas na rigs lnga las byung ni rigs lnga rnams ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnams so //
translated: Therefore, arisen from the five clans means the five clans are the five intuitions, mirror-intuition, etc.

original: de rnams kyi byung ba ni byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi byung ba ni byung ba ste /
translated: Their arising is the arising.

original: gang la spro ba de ni rigs lnga las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang la spro ba de ni rigs lnga las byung ba'o //
translated: He who is expanded in that way is arisen from the five clans.

original: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de //
translated: Or else, how and what is found

original: de ltar bcu drug lon pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar bcu drug lon pa ni /
translated: in that way, when sixteen years old.

original: rigs lnga med na spyir ji ltar gang rnyed pa de la bya ste bzang mo ma yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rigs lnga med na spyir ji ltar gang rnyed pa de la bya ste bzang mo ma yin pa yang ngo //
translated: If there are no five clans, in general, how and what is found in that way, when sixteen years old, is to be done, even if she is not a good woman.

original: @113b 'on kyang slar lo bcu drug ma bzung ste /
analyzed: @113b 'on kyang slar lo bcu drug ma bzung ste /
translated: But not taking a sixteen-year-old girl,

original: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the bodhicitta would flow out.

original: yang na / yang na zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: yang na / yang na zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can no //
translated: Or else means that Nairatmya, inseparable from the Vajra Holder, is the nature of the Vajra Holder, the nature of the intuition of reality.

original: gang de zhes pa ni gtan la phan  par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang de zhes pa ni gtan la phan  par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What that means is that it is not possible to establish it.

original: ji ltar rnyed pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa ni /
translated: How and what is found🔽.

original: gang dang gang gi rnam par rnyed pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi rnam par rnyed pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The gnosis that is found in this or that form.

original: bcu drug lon pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: bcu drug lon pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The sixteen years old is the purification of the sixteen emptinesses.

original: chu byang chub kyi sems so //🔽de ster zhing yongs su gtong ba yin pas lo bcu drug ma ste stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin des bdag med ma de'i bdag nyid kyis yongs su btang ba yin pas bdag chags kyi skyon yang de
analyzed: chu byang chub kyi sems so // de ster zhing yongs su gtong ba yin pas lo bcu drug ma ste stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin des bdag med ma de'i bdag nyid kyis yongs su btang ba yin pas bdag chags kyi skyon yang de
translated: The water is the bodhicitta.🔽 Since she gives and bestows that, she is sixteen years old, and with that nature of bodhicitta, which is the purification of the sixteen emptinesses, she is given by the nature of Nairātmya.

original: la med pa yin no //
analyzed: la med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fault of attachment to self is also absent in her.

original: de yang btsun mo bsten par bya ba yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang btsun mo bsten par bya ba yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, she is to be attended by the queen.

original: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa //
translated: When the bodhicitta is filled,

original: de yi tshe na bsten par bya ;
analyzed: de yi tshe na bsten par bya ;
translated: at that time she is to be attended.

original: / gang gi tshe de'i byang chub kyi sems 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na phyag rgya de bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: / gang gi tshe de'i byang chub kyi sems 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na phyag rgya de bsten par bya'o //
translated: When her bodhicitta arises, at that time that seal is to be attended.

original: yang de'i tshe ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: yang de'i tshe ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: At that time, it is the great seal.🔽 🔽The great seal is the great seal of the body.

original: bsten par bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsten par bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
translated: “One should practice” means one should cultivate.

original: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: “When it is endowed with semen” means when it is the bodhicitta.

original: ldan pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Endowed” means endowed with the gnosis of the indivisibility of emptiness and compassion.

original: 'dis ci bstan na /
analyzed: 'dis ci bstan na /
translated: What does this teach?

original: phyag rgya chen po goms par byas pa la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon du 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po goms par byas pa la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon du 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: When one cultivates the great seal, the emptiness endowed with the supreme of all aspects becomes manifest.

original: de yang phyag rgya bsten pa las gang byang pa de'i bya ba bstan pa /
analyzed: de yang phyag rgya bsten pa las gang byang pa de'i bya ba bstan pa /
translated: Moreover, the activity of the one who has purified that which arises from the practice of the seal is taught:

original: phya rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phya rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no //
translated: The face of the seal is also bound, and the face of the method is also like that.

original: bsten pa de las gang byung ba //
analyzed: bsten pa de las gang byung ba //
translated: What arises from that practice

original: slob ma'i khar ni btung ba nyid //
analyzed: slob ma'i khar ni btung ba nyid //
translated: is drunk by the disciple’s mouth.

original: btsun mo'i gdong dang thabs kyi gdong par mig ras bcings la bya'o //
analyzed: btsun mo'i gdong dang thabs kyi gdong par mig ras bcings la bya'o //
translated: The face of the queen and the face of the method should be covered with a blindfold.

original: bsten pa ni goms pa'o //
analyzed: bsten pa ni goms pa'o //
translated: “Practice” means cultivation.

original: der gang byung ba ni gang byang chub kyi sems byung ba ste /
analyzed: der gang byung ba ni gang byang chub kyi sems byung ba ste /
translated: “What arises from that” means what arises from the bodhicitta.

original: slob ma'i khar btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i khar btung bar bya'o //
translated: One should drink it into the mouth of the disciple.

original: yang na phyag rgya ni bdag med mas so //
analyzed: yang na phyag rgya ni bdag med mas so //
translated: Or, the seal is Nairātmya.

original: gdong ni dang po stong pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: gdong ni dang po stong pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The face is the first enlightenment of emptiness.

original: bcing ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcing ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
translated: The binding is the stabilization.

original: thabs gyi  ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thabs gyi  ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The method is the vajra-holder.

original: gdong ni snying rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gdong ni snying rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The face is the nature of compassion.

original: bcing ba ni brtan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bcing ba ni brtan par byas pa'o //
translated: The binding is the stabilization.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje mi g-yo bar byas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje mi g-yo bar byas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas so //
translated: Having generated the enlightenment mind of emptiness and compassion,

original: bsten pa @114a * //
analyzed: bsten pa @114a * //
translated: the reliance

original: ni byang chub kyi sems sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: ni byang chub kyi sems sbyangs pa'o //
translated: is the training in the enlightenment mind.

original: gang byung ba ni gang byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang byung ba ni gang byung ba'o //
translated: Whatever arises is whatever arises.

original: de slob ma'i khar ni slob ma'i dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: de slob ma'i khar ni slob ma'i dbang po rnams so //
translated: That is in the mouth of the disciple, the faculties of the disciple.

original: de rnams kyi kha ni yul rnams yin pas slob ma'i kha yul dang dbang po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi kha ni yul rnams yin pas slob ma'i kha yul dang dbang po'o //
translated: Since the mouth of those is the objects, the mouth of the disciple is the objects and the faculties.

original: der btung ba ni bsdu ba ste de dbyer med par bya ba'i don te gang byang chub kyi sems de yul dang dbang po ldog pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: der btung ba ni bsdu ba ste de dbyer med par bya ba'i don te gang byang chub kyi sems de yul dang dbang po ldog pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
translated: Drinking it there is the union, the meaning of which is to make them inseparable, the meaning of which is that the enlightenment mind is the reversal of the objects and the faculties.

original: 'di nyid mngon par gsal bar byas pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid mngon par gsal bar byas pa /
translated: This is made clear.

original: ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid //
analyzed: ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid //
translated: Equal taste is the domain of the disciple.

original: de nyid la byang bar bya //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: de nyid la byang bar bya // zhes pa la /
translated: One should be trained in that.

original: de nyid la zhes pa ni goms pas so //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes pa ni goms pas so //
translated: In that, the “that” is the familiarization.

original: ro mnyam ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'i ;
analyzed: ro mnyam ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'i ;
translated: Equal taste is the awakening mind of inseparable emptiness and compassion.

original: / slob ma'i spyod yul nyid ni /
analyzed: / slob ma'i spyod yul nyid ni /
translated: The domain of the disciple is the domain of the sense faculties.

original: 'dir dbang po rnams spyod pa yin pas spyod pa yin pas spyod yul te yul lo //
analyzed: 'dir dbang po rnams spyod pa yin pas spyod pa yin pas spyod yul te yul lo //
translated: Here, since the sense faculties engage, they are the domain, the object.

original: slob ma ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: slob ma ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: The disciple is the sense faculties.

original: slob ma yang yin la spyod yul yang yin pas slob ma'i spyod yul te dbang po dang yul ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma yang yin la spyod yul yang yin pas slob ma'i spyod yul te dbang po dang yul ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: Since they are both disciples and the domain, the domain of the disciple is the sense faculties and objects with equal taste.

original: bya bar bya ni thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang dbyer med pa yin te kun rdzob tu yang don 'di yin no //
analyzed: bya bar bya ni thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang dbyer med pa yin te kun rdzob tu yang don 'di yin no //
translated: The action is that everything is inseparable from the awakening mind, and this is the case even conventionally.

original: de nyid la ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid la ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: That is the seal.

original: slob ma'i spyod yul ni slob ma dang nye ba'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i spyod yul ni slob ma dang nye ba'o //
translated: The domain of the disciple is the proximity of the disciple.

original: ro mnyam ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: ro mnyam ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Equal taste is the gathering.

original: bya ba ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni bya ba'o //
translated: Action is the activity.

original: cir 'gyur ba yin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: cir 'gyur ba yin pa gsungs pa /
translated: What is it?

original: rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
translated: It is self-awareness, intuition.

original: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
analyzed: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
translated: It is free from the self-awareness of self and other.

original: mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid //
translated: It is emptiness, equal to space, free from atoms.🔽It is the supreme nature of existence and non-existence.

original: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / thabs dang shes rab shin du 'dres //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / thabs dang shes rab shin du 'dres //
translated: It is the perfect union of means and intuition.

original: 'dod chags chags bral rnam par 'dres //
analyzed: 'dod chags chags bral rnam par 'dres //
translated: It is the perfect union of desire and freedom from desire.

original: zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes pa smos te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: de la yod pa'i rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyis yang dag par myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la yod pa'i rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyis yang dag par myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: It is experienced by the self-awareness that exists.

original: de'i phyir rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is self-awareness.

original: ye shes ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Intuition is right intuition.

original: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
analyzed: de cis khyad 'phags she na /
translated: How is it superior?

original: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs te /
analyzed: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs te /
translated: It is free from the self-awareness of self and other.

original: bdag gzhan du rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gzhan du rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from the conception of self and other.

original: de lta bur gyur pa brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir dpes ston to //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir dpes ston to //
translated: Since it is like that, it cannot be expressed, so it is taught by analogy.

original: ye shes te mkha' mnyam mo //
analyzed: ye shes te mkha' mnyam mo //
translated: It is intuition, equal to space.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is like space, because it is without beginning or end.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdul bral dri med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdul bral dri med do //
translated: Therefore, it is free from dust, stainless.

original: de nyid kyis na stong pa ste rang bzhin dang bral bas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na stong pa ste rang bzhin dang bral bas so //
translated: By that very fact, it is empty, because it is free from intrinsic nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos med bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos med bdag nyid do //
translated: For that very reason, it is the nature of both existence and non-existence.

original: dngos po 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po 'khor ba'o //
translated: Existence is saṃsāra.

original: dngos po med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Non-existence is nirvāṇa.

original: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid 'khor ba dang rnam par byang ba dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid 'khor ba dang rnam par byang ba dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The nature of both is the inseparability of saṃsāra and purification.

original: de nyid kyi @114b phyir mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi @114b phyir mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is supreme, because it is exalted.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the domain of śrāvakas and so on.

original: slar yang cis khyad par 'phags pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang cis khyad par 'phags pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
translated: Again, why is it exalted? That is stated:

original: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres /
translated: Well-mixed with method and wisdom.

original: shes rab ni btsun mo'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni btsun mo'o //
translated: Wisdom is the queen.

original: thabs ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni skyes pa'o //
translated: Method is the king.

original: de dag khyad par du shin tu 'dres pas chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag khyad par du shin tu 'dres pas chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are well-mixed, like water and milk, they are non-dual by nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'dod chags chags bral rnam par 'dres //
analyzed: 'dod chags chags bral rnam par 'dres //
translated: Attachment and non-attachment are mixed.

original: 'dod chags ni chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Attachment is the characteristic of attachment.

original: chags bral ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: chags bral ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: Non-attachment is the complete abandonment of that.

original: spangs pa yang chags pa nyid do //
analyzed: spangs pa yang chags pa nyid do //
translated: Abandonment is attachment itself.

original: gnyi ga yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Both are by the process of distinction.

original: 'dres pa ni 'dren mar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa ni 'dren mar gyur pa'o //
translated: Mixed means mixed together.

original: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
analyzed: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
translated: Not attachment, not non-attachment,

original: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the middle is not perceived.

original: rtog pa med pa ste 'di nyid lhan cig skyes pa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa ste 'di nyid lhan cig skyes pa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid yin no //
translated: This is the reality of innate, authentic wisdom.

original: yang na rang rig ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: yang na rang rig ni rgyu'o //
translated: Or, self-awareness is the cause.

original: ye shes 'gyur ni rtogs par 'gyur ba'o ;
analyzed: ye shes 'gyur ni rtogs par 'gyur ba'o ;
translated: The transformation of wisdom is the realization.

original: / ye shes de yang /
analyzed: / ye shes de yang /
translated: And that wisdom

original: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
analyzed: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
translated: is free from authentic self-awareness.

original: rang ni sems so gzhan ni yul dang dbang po'o //
analyzed: rang ni sems so gzhan ni yul dang dbang po'o //
translated: Self refers to the mind, other refers to objects and faculties.

original: yang dag rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Authentic awareness is the characteristic of the experience of pleasure and so forth.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'di rnams kyis bskyed pa'i bde ba la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba de spangs pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'di rnams kyis bskyed pa'i bde ba la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba de spangs pa'o //
translated: The experience of pleasure, etc. , generated by these objects, sense faculties, and consciousnesses is abandoned.

original: cis khyad par 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad par 'phags she na /
translated: How is it distinguished?

original: mkha' mnyam ste /
analyzed: mkha' mnyam ste /
translated: It is equal to space.

original: mkha' ni dbang po'o //
analyzed: mkha' ni dbang po'o //
translated: Space is the sense faculty.

original: de mnyam ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i mngon shes kyi yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mnyam ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i mngon shes kyi yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is equal to that because the qualities of the superknowledges, such as the divine eye, arise from it.🔽Moreover, it is free from atoms, that is, it is made stainless by the two processes.

original: de yang rdul bral ste rim pa gnyis dri ma med par byas pa de stong pa de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid rtog pa thams cad dang rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rdul bral ste rim pa gnyis dri ma med par byas pa de stong pa de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid rtog pa thams cad dang rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is emptiness, the nature of reality, and it transcends all conceptualization and discursive thought.

original: de yang dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de yang dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de /
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of both entity and nonentity.

original: dngos po'i dngos med ni dngos dang dngos med de gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i dngos med ni dngos dang dngos med de gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nonentity of an entity is both entity and nonentity because it is originally unborn.

original: de bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Its nature is that nature of that.

original: de mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is supreme because it generates the highest, perfect enlightenment.

original: yang na rang rig ye shes ni dga' ba tsam mo //
analyzed: yang na rang rig ye shes ni dga' ba tsam mo //
translated: Or, self-knowing wisdom is just the joy.

original: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
analyzed: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
translated: Abandoning the pure awareness of self and other,

original: mkha' mnyam ni mchog dga'o //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam ni mchog dga'o //
translated: equal to space is the supreme joy.

original: rdul bral ste stong pa nyid ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdul bral ste stong pa nyid ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: Free from dust, that is, emptiness, is the special joy.

original: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The supreme nature of entity and non-entity is the innate joy.

original: bzhi pa'i 'di nyid ji ltar yin @115a * //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i 'di nyid ji ltar yin @115a * //
translated: How is this the fourth?

original: pa de gsungs pa /
analyzed: pa de gsungs pa /
translated: He says:

original: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
translated: The method and wisdom are well mixed.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Vajradhara and Nairātmya are inseparable.

original: de bas na bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bzhi pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the fourth.

original: chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres //
translated: Passion and passionlessness are well mixed.

original: chags pa 'od dpag med byang chub kyi sems khu ba'o //
analyzed: chags pa 'od dpag med byang chub kyi sems khu ba'o //
translated: Passion is the bodhicitta element, Amitābha.

original: chags bral ni chags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: chags bral ni chags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: Passionlessness is the bliss of the innate joy that completely abandons all passion.

original: de dag rnam par 'dres pa ni /
analyzed: de dag rnam par 'dres pa ni /
translated: Those two are well mixed.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis dbyer med pa ste bde ba spangs nas de ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis dbyer med pa ste bde ba spangs nas de ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.

original: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis goms pa las dga' ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis goms pa las dga' ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.

original: des na yang gang bzhi pa'i don de nyid bdag med ma dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //🔽de ni lta ba thams cad nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nang du chud pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na yang gang bzhi pa'i don de nyid bdag med ma dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o // de ni lta ba thams cad nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nang du chud pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.

original: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog ni de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog ni de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.🔽The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state, and is the supreme state of the supreme state of the supreme state.

original: srog chags rnams kyi ni skye bo rnams kyi'o //🔽srog ni srog ste de'i nang du son pa'i phyir de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid dang ldan pa rnams kyang de kho na nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes grub pa yin no //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi ni skye bo rnams kyi'o //🔽srog ni srog ste de'i nang du son pa'i phyir de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid dang ldan pa rnams kyang de kho na nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes grub pa yin no //
translated: The supreme state is the supreme state of the supreme state

original: yang na de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Or else, he is the Vajra-holder.

original: srog chags rnams kyi srog ni sems so //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi srog ni sems so //
translated: The life of living beings is the mind.

original: 'di rnams yod pas srog chags de n'a da'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams yod pas srog chags de n'a da'o //
translated: Since these exist, he is the living being.

original: srog 'di rnams kyi n'a da dang 'brel pa yang sems so //
analyzed: srog 'di rnams kyi n'a da dang 'brel pa yang sems so //
translated: The life of these is the mind, which is connected with the nāḍī.

original: n'a da yang rlung bcu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: n'a da yang rlung bcu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The nāḍī is the nature of the ten winds.

original: de yang dbang po dang yul rnams de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa sku gsung thugs te /
analyzed: de yang dbang po dang yul rnams de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa sku gsung thugs te /
translated: That is the Vajra-holder, whose nature is the body, speech, and mind of the sense powers and their objects.

original: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Thus, the indivisibility of the three vajras is the Vajra-holder.

original: de nyid 'di'i 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa ni rdul dang mun pa dang / snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'di'i 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa ni rdul dang mun pa dang / snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: He is the self of the world, which is the nature of the state of the equality of rajas, tamas, and sattva.

original: rang bzhin smra ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin smra ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the nature of the nature-advocates.

original: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yang thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yang thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: The world is the nature of the world. Everything is the Vajra-holder.

original: yang na 'di zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na 'di zhes pa ni /
translated: Or else, he is the self of the world.

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the identity of the moving and the unmoving.

original: 'gro bdag nyid ces pa la 'gro ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams kyi 'gyur pa ste phung po dang khams kyi bdag nyid 'di bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: 'gro bdag nyid ces pa la 'gro ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa rnams kyi 'gyur pa ste phung po dang khams kyi bdag nyid 'di bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The identity of the moving is the transformation of the aggregates, elements, etc., such as form, etc. The Blessed One is the identity of the aggregates and elements.

original: de nyid thams cad khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad khyab pa'o //
translated: He is the all-pervading.

original: 'di nyid 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid 'di'o //
translated: He is this very thing.

original: de nyid 'di ni 'gro @115b ba'i bdag nyid dang thams cad khyab pa nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'di ni 'gro @115b ba'i bdag nyid dang thams cad khyab pa nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das yin no //
translated: He is the identity of the moving and the all-pervading.

original: 'gro ba thams cad khyab 'jug bdag / ces pa ni khyab 'jug gi lto ba la brten pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad khyab 'jug bdag / ces pa ni khyab 'jug gi lto ba la brten pa rnams so //
translated: The identity of the moving is the identity of Vishnu, who is based on the belly of Vishnu.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: thams cad lus la rnam par gnas /
analyzed: thams cad lus la rnam par gnas /
translated: he is present in all bodies.

original: lus kun rnams la rnam par gnas te thams cad kyi lus la rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lus kun rnams la rnam par gnas te thams cad kyi lus la rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: He is present in all bodies, present in all bodies.🔽By this,

original: 'dis ni / ye shes chen po lus la gnas //🔽rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'dis ni / ye shes chen po lus la gnas // rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
translated: great knowledge is present in the body,🔽having abandoned all conceptualization.

original: dngos po kun la khyab pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po kun la khyab pa ste /
translated: He pervades all things.

original: lus gnas lus las skyes pa min //
analyzed: lus gnas lus las skyes pa min //
translated: Not dwelling in the body, not born from the body.

original: zhes pa'o // dngos dang dngos med de las byung //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dngos dang dngos med de las byung //
translated: Things and non-things arise from that.

original: gzhan dang gang dang de rnams dang / dngos po dang na 'khor pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang gang dang de rnams dang / dngos po dang na 'khor pa'o //
translated: The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.

original: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Non-things are nirvana.

original: gnyi ga yang de las byung zhing de las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang de las byung zhing de las skyes pa'o //
translated: Both things and non-things arise from that and are born from that.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Because the two truths, the conventional and the ultimate, are inseparable, [the deity] is Vajradhara.

original: yang na dngos ni thabs te rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dngos ni thabs te rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, things are the method, Vajradhara.

original: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag med ma'o //
translated: Non-things are nirvana, Nairātmya.

original: de gnyi ga yang de las byung ba ste de las skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang de las byung ba ste de las skyes pa nyid do //
translated: Both of those arise from that, are born from that.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.

original: gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang ni gzhan rnams ni 'di thams cad sems dang dbyer med pa'i phyir gzhan rnams te dbang po drug rnams so //🔽gang rnams de rnams ni zhes pa ni /🔽gang rnams ni g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang ni gzhan rnams ni 'di thams cad sems dang dbyer med pa'i phyir gzhan rnams te dbang po drug rnams so //🔽gang rnams de rnams ni zhes pa ni /🔽gang rnams ni g-yo ba'o //
translated: The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.🔽The other, whatever, those, and things, are cyclic existence.

original: de rnams zhes pa ni brtan pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams zhes pa ni brtan pa ste /
translated: “Those” refers to the stable.

original: gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g-yo //
analyzed: gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g-yo //
translated: “Those” are stable and unstable.

original: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab dag de nas dbang po drug rnams dang / de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba rtogs pa'i phyir thams cad yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nang du son pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab dag de nas dbang po drug rnams dang / de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba rtogs pa'i phyir thams cad yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nang du son pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, method and wisdom are included in the knowledge of the six sense faculties, and the stable and unstable are included in the knowledge of reality.

original: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: sems can dang ni rnam shes tshul //
analyzed: sems can dang ni rnam shes tshul //
translated: The way of sentient beings and consciousness,🔽the person, the past, Īśvara,

original: skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba thams cad dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni //
analyzed: skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba thams cad dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni //
translated: the self, all living beings, time, and the individual,

original: zhes pa la sems can zhes pa ni rig byed smra ba rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sems can zhes pa ni rig byed smra ba rnams kyi ste /
translated: Here, “sentient beings” refers to the proponents of the Vedas.

original: skye pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir de rtag pa'i ye shes yin no //
analyzed: skye pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir de rtag pa'i ye shes yin no //
translated: Because they are free from birth, they are eternal knowledge.

original: de yang de la rag las pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang de la rag las pa nyid yin no //
translated: Moreover, they depend on that.

original: rnam shes tshul zhes pa ni rnam par shes par smra ba rnams te rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam shes tshul zhes pa ni rnam par shes par smra ba rnams te rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: “The way of consciousness” refers to the proponents of consciousness, the Yogācāras.

original: de yang de la rag las pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang de la rag las pa yin no //
translated: and that depends on it.🔽The state of the equality of rajas, tamas, and sattva is called the nature of the person.🔽The person is the best nature.🔽The view of the person is included in that.🔽The view of the person is included in that.

original: skyes bu zhes pa ni rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs ni rang bzhin te rang bzhin mchog gi skyes bu yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu zhes pa ni rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs ni rang bzhin te rang bzhin mchog gi skyes bu yin no //
translated: The view of the person is included in that.

original: gang gi lta ba de yang @116a * //
analyzed: gang gi lta ba de yang @116a * //
translated: The view of the person is included in that.

original: de'i nang du 'dus pa nyid yin no //🔽sngon rabs zhes pa ni rig byed pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du 'dus pa nyid yin no // sngon rabs zhes pa ni rig byed pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The view of the person is included in that.🔽The view of the person is included in that.

original: dbang phyug ces pa ni dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //🔽bdag ces pa ni tshangs pa ye shes dang ldan pa rtag pa gcig pu'i mnga' bdag yin pa gang gi lta ba'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ces pa ni dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod pa rnams kyi'o // bdag ces pa ni tshangs pa ye shes dang ldan pa rtag pa gcig pu'i mnga' bdag yin pa gang gi lta ba'o //
translated: The view of the person is included in that.🔽The view of the person is included in that.🔽The view of the person is included in that.🔽The view of the person is included in that.

original: gso ba zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad sems dang ldan par 'dod pa gang rnams kyi lta ba'o //🔽thams cad ces pa ni rgyal po'i bstan bcos su shes par bya'o //
